@graph.description: Easy Coriander Rice Recipe | Cilantro Rice | Coriander Pulao or Kothamalli Rice

recipeInstructions.text: Firstly, to prepare the masala paste. In a mixer jar take ½ bunch coriander, few mint, 5 chilli, 1 inch ginger and 7 cloves garlic.
recipeInstructions.name: Firstly, to prepare the masala paste. In a mixer jar take ½ bunch coriander, few mint, 5 chilli, 1 inch ginger and 7 cloves garlic.

recipeInstructions.text: Also add 1 inch cinnamon, 1 black cardamom, 5 pods cardamom, 6 cloves and ½ tsp pepper.
recipeInstructions.name: Also add 1 inch cinnamon, 1 black cardamom, 5 pods cardamom, 6 cloves and ½ tsp pepper.

recipeInstructions.text: Add water as required and grind to a smooth paste. Keep aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Add water as required and grind to a smooth paste. Keep aside.

recipeInstructions.text: In a large kadai, heat 2 tbsp ghee. Add 1 tsp cumin, 1 onion and saute well.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large kadai, heat 2 tbsp ghee. Add 1 tsp cumin, 1 onion and saute well.

recipeInstructions.text: Also add ½ capsicum, 1 potato, 1 carrot, 5 beans, and 4 tbsp peas.
recipeInstructions.name: Also add ½ capsicum, 1 potato, 1 carrot, 5 beans, and 4 tbsp peas.

recipeInstructions.text: Stir fry till the vegetables turn crunchy.
recipeInstructions.name: Stir fry till the vegetables turn crunchy.

recipeInstructions.text: Further, add prepared masala paste and cook well.
recipeInstructions.name: Further, add prepared masala paste and cook well.

recipeInstructions.text: Now add 3 cup water, 2 tsp salt and mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: Now add 3 cup water, 2 tsp salt and mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: Once the water comes to a boil, add 1½ cup basmati rice, 2 tsp lemon juice and mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: Once the water comes to a boil, add 1½ cup basmati rice, 2 tsp lemon juice and mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: Cover and simmer for 20 minutes or until the rice is cooked well.
recipeInstructions.name: Cover and simmer for 20 minutes or until the rice is cooked well.

recipeInstructions.text: Fluff the rice gently without breaking the rice grains.
recipeInstructions.name: Fluff the rice gently without breaking the rice grains.

recipeInstructions.text: Finally, enjoy Coriander Rice Recipe / Cilantro Rice with raita.
recipeInstructions.name: Finally, enjoy Coriander Rice Recipe / Cilantro Rice with raita.

recipeInstructions.text: firstly dry roast 1 cup rolled oats. take unflavoured oats as we are adding spices.

recipeInstructions.text: roast until the oats turn crisp.
recipeInstructions.name: roast until the oats turn crisp.

recipeInstructions.text: cool the oats completely and blend to a fine powder without adding any water.
recipeInstructions.name: cool the oats completely and blend to a fine powder without adding any water.

recipeInstructions.text: transfer the powdered oats into a large mixing bowl.

recipeInstructions.text: also, add 2 tbsp rava for binding.
recipeInstructions.name: also, add 2 tbsp rava for binding.

recipeInstructions.text: now add ¼ cup curd and 1 cup water.

recipeInstructions.text: whisk and mix make smooth lump free batter.
recipeInstructions.name: whisk and mix make smooth lump free batter.

recipeInstructions.text: additionally, add ¼ tsp turmeric, ½ tsp ginger paste, 2 chilli, ½ tsp crushed cumin.
recipeInstructions.name: additionally, add ¼ tsp turmeric, ½ tsp ginger paste, 2 chilli, ½ tsp crushed cumin.

recipeInstructions.text: also add 2 tbsp onion, 2 tbsp tomato and ½ tsp salt.
recipeInstructions.name: also add 2 tbsp onion, 2 tbsp tomato and ½ tsp salt.

recipeInstructions.text: mix well forming thick flowing consistency chilla batter.
recipeInstructions.name: mix well forming thick flowing consistency chilla batter.

recipeInstructions.text: further, pour a ladleful of batter onto a hot tawa and spread gently.
recipeInstructions.name: further, pour a ladleful of batter onto a hot tawa and spread gently.

recipeInstructions.text: pour ½ tsp of olive oil over chilla.
recipeInstructions.name: pour ½ tsp of olive oil over chilla.

recipeInstructions.text: cover and allow cooking on a medium flame for a minute.
recipeInstructions.name: cover and allow cooking on a medium flame for a minute.

recipeInstructions.text: now flip the chilla and cook both sides pressing gently.
recipeInstructions.name: now flip the chilla and cook both sides pressing gently.

recipeInstructions.text: finally, oats chilla is ready to serve with green chutney.

@graph.name: methi ka nashta recipe | sooji besan methi nashta | fenugreek leaves snack
@graph.description: easy methi ka nashta recipe | sooji besan methi nashta | fenugreek leaves snack

recipeInstructions.text: firstly, in a large bowl take 1 cup besan, 1 cup rava.
recipeInstructions.name: firstly, in a large bowl take 1 cup besan, 1 cup rava.

recipeInstructions.text: add 1 bunch methi, 1 carrot, 1 tsp ginger paste and 1 chilli.
recipeInstructions.name: add 1 bunch methi, 1 carrot, 1 tsp ginger paste and 1 chilli.

recipeInstructions.text: also add ½ cup curd, ¾ tsp salt and mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: also add ½ cup curd, ¾ tsp salt and mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: now add ½ cup water and mix well forming a thick batter.
recipeInstructions.name: now add ½ cup water and mix well forming a thick batter.

recipeInstructions.text: rest for 10 minutes or until the rava absorbs water well.
recipeInstructions.name: rest for 10 minutes or until the rava absorbs water well.

recipeInstructions.text: now add ½ cup water and adjust consistency mixing well.
recipeInstructions.name: now add ½ cup water and adjust consistency mixing well.

recipeInstructions.text: scoop out 2 ladlefuls of batter in a small bowl.
recipeInstructions.name: scoop out 2 ladlefuls of batter in a small bowl.

recipeInstructions.text: add ½ tsp eno and mix gently.
recipeInstructions.name: add ½ tsp eno and mix gently.

recipeInstructions.text: now in a pan heat 2 tbsp oil. splutter ½ tsp mustard, 1 tsp sesame, ½ tsp cumin, pinch hing and few curry leaves.
recipeInstructions.name: now in a pan heat 2 tbsp oil. splutter ½ tsp mustard, 1 tsp sesame, ½ tsp cumin, pinch hing and few curry leaves.

recipeInstructions.text: once the tempering splutters, pour in the prepared batter.
recipeInstructions.name: once the tempering splutters, pour in the prepared batter.

recipeInstructions.text: also sprinkle pinch chilli powder on top.
recipeInstructions.name: also sprinkle pinch chilli powder on top.

recipeInstructions.text: cover and simmer for 2 minutes or until the base gets cooked well.
recipeInstructions.name: cover and simmer for 2 minutes or until the base gets cooked well.

recipeInstructions.text: now flip over and mark a slit in the centre.
recipeInstructions.name: now flip over and mark a slit in the centre.

recipeInstructions.text: place 1 tbsp butter and allow to roast on low flame until both sides are cooked well.
recipeInstructions.name: place 1 tbsp butter and allow to roast on low flame until both sides are cooked well.

recipeInstructions.text: finally, enjoy methi ka nashta with tomato sauce.
recipeInstructions.name: finally, enjoy methi ka nashta with tomato sauce.

@graph.description: ಸುಲಭ ಸಮೋಸಾ ಚಾಟ್ ಪಾಕವಿಧಾನ | ಸಮೋಸಾ ಮಟರ್ ಚಾಟ್ ಪಾಕವಿಧಾನವನ್ನು ಹೇಗೆ ಮಾಡುವುದು

recipeInstructions.text: ಮೊದಲನೆಯದಾಗಿ, 1 ಸಮೋಸಾವನ್ನು ಸ್ಥೂಲವಾಗಿ ಮುರಿಯಿರಿ. ನೀವು ಮನೆಯಲ್ಲಿ ತಯಾರಿಸಿದ ಸಮೋಸಾ ಅಥವಾ ಅಂಗಡಿಯಿಂದ ತಂದ ಸಮೋಸಾವನ್ನು ಬಳಸಬಹುದು.
recipeInstructions.name: ಮೊದಲನೆಯದಾಗಿ, 1 ಸಮೋಸಾವನ್ನು ಸ್ಥೂಲವಾಗಿ ಮುರಿಯಿರಿ. ನೀವು ಮನೆಯಲ್ಲಿ ತಯಾರಿಸಿದ ಸಮೋಸಾ ಅಥವಾ ಅಂಗಡಿಯಿಂದ ತಂದ ಸಮೋಸಾವನ್ನು ಬಳಸಬಹುದು.

recipeInstructions.text: 1 ಕಪ್ ರಗ್ಡಾದಲ್ಲಿ ಸುರಿಯಿರಿ. ನನ್ನ ಹಿಂದಿನ ಪೋಸ್ಟ್ನಲ್ಲಿ ರಗ್ಡಾವನ್ನು ಹೇಗೆ ತಯಾರಿಸಬೇಕೆಂದು ನಾನು ಈಗಾಗಲೇ ಹಂಚಿಕೊಂಡಿದ್ದೇನೆ.

recipeInstructions.text: 1 ಟೀಸ್ಪೂನ್ ಹುಣಿಸೆ ಚಟ್ನಿ ಮತ್ತು 1 ಟೀಸ್ಪೂನ್ ಹಸಿರು ಚಟ್ನಿಯೊಂದಿಗೆ ಮೇಲಕ್ಕೆ ಹಾಕಿ.

@graph.name: namak pare recipe | namak para recipe | spicy diamond cuts recipe
@graph.description: easy namak pare recipe | namak para recipe | spicy diamond cuts recipe

recipeInstructions.text: firstly, in a large mixing bow take 2 cup wheat flour and 2 tbsp rava.
recipeInstructions.name: firstly, in a large mixing bow take 2 cup wheat flour and 2 tbsp rava.

recipeInstructions.text: also add 1 tsp ajwain, ½ tsp pepper and ½ tsp salt. mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: also add 1 tsp ajwain, ½ tsp pepper and ½ tsp salt. mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: now pour hot ghee/oil over the flour. this helps to make namak pare crispy.
recipeInstructions.name: now pour hot ghee/oil over the flour. this helps to make namak pare crispy.

recipeInstructions.text: crumble the oil with dough well. rub with your hands. be careful as the oil will be very hot.
recipeInstructions.name: crumble the oil with dough well. rub with your hands. be careful as the oil will be very hot.

recipeInstructions.text: now add water slowly and start to knead the dough.
recipeInstructions.name: now add water slowly and start to knead the dough.

recipeInstructions.text: knead the dough well, until form stiff and tight dough.
recipeInstructions.name: knead the dough well, until form stiff and tight dough.

recipeInstructions.text: pinch a large ball. flatten them as you do with chapathi ball.
recipeInstructions.name: pinch a large ball. flatten them as you do with chapathi ball.

recipeInstructions.text: now dust some wheat flour, roll them into round / square shape making slightly thick than chapathi.
recipeInstructions.name: now dust some wheat flour, roll them into round / square shape making slightly thick than chapathi.

recipeInstructions.text: take a knife / pizza cutter and cut them into long strips or shape of your choice.
recipeInstructions.name: take a knife / pizza cutter and cut them into long strips or shape of your choice.

recipeInstructions.text: drop the namak pare into the hot oil. or bake in preheated oven at 180-degree celsius for 15-20 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: drop the namak pare into the hot oil. or bake in preheated oven at 180-degree celsius for 15-20 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: flip over so that it cooks on both sides.
recipeInstructions.name: flip over so that it cooks on both sides.

recipeInstructions.text: fry them to nice golden brown on low-medium flame. drain them on a kitchen towel to remove excess oil.
recipeInstructions.name: fry them to nice golden brown on low-medium flame. drain them on a kitchen towel to remove excess oil.

recipeInstructions.text: finally, allow namak pare to cool to room temperature and store them into an airtight container.
recipeInstructions.name: finally, allow namak pare to cool to room temperature and store them into an airtight container.

recipeInstructions.name: how to make nuts powder:

itemListElement.text: firstly, in pan dry roast 2 tbsp cashew and 2 tbsp almonds.
itemListElement.name: firstly, in pan dry roast 2 tbsp cashew and 2 tbsp almonds.

itemListElement.text: roast until the nuts turn crunchy.
itemListElement.name: roast until the nuts turn crunchy.

itemListElement.text: cool completely, and blend to a coarse powder. keep aside.
itemListElement.name: cool completely, and blend to a coarse powder. keep aside.

recipeInstructions.name: how to make instant mawa or khova using milk powder:

itemListElement.text: firstly, in a pan take 2 tsp ghee, ¾ cup milk and 1 cup milk powder.
itemListElement.name: firstly, in a pan take 2 tsp ghee, ¾ cup milk and 1 cup milk powder.

itemListElement.text: stir and mix well making sure there are no lumps.
itemListElement.name: stir and mix well making sure there are no lumps.

itemListElement.text: continue to cook on low flame without burning.
itemListElement.name: continue to cook on low flame without burning.

itemListElement.text: keep stirring until the mixture thickens and separates from the pan.
itemListElement.name: keep stirring until the mixture thickens and separates from the pan.

itemListElement.text: instant mawa is ready, you can use immediately or refrigerate and use up to a week.
itemListElement.name: instant mawa is ready, you can use immediately or refrigerate and use up to a week.

recipeInstructions.name: how to make kheer:

itemListElement.text: firstly, in a large kadai take 1½ litre milk and ¼ tsp saffron.
itemListElement.name: firstly, in a large kadai take 1½ litre milk and ¼ tsp saffron.

itemListElement.text: keep stirring and get the milk to a boil.
itemListElement.name: keep stirring and get the milk to a boil.

itemListElement.text: once the milk comes to a boil, add powdered nuts powder.
itemListElement.name: once the milk comes to a boil, add powdered nuts powder.

itemListElement.text: stir well and boil for 5 minutes.
itemListElement.name: stir well and boil for 5 minutes.

itemListElement.text: further, add prepared mawa and mix well. you can alternatively use 1 cup store brought khova too.
itemListElement.name: further, add prepared mawa and mix well. you can alternatively use 1 cup store brought khova too.

itemListElement.text: mix well and simmer for 15 minutes.
itemListElement.name: mix well and simmer for 15 minutes.

itemListElement.text: now add ½ cup sugar and boil until the sugar dissolves.
itemListElement.name: now add ½ cup sugar and boil until the sugar dissolves.

itemListElement.text: get the kheer to a rolling boil or until the kheer turns creamy texture.
itemListElement.name: get the kheer to a rolling boil or until the kheer turns creamy texture.

itemListElement.text: to roast the dry fruits, heat 2 tbsp ghee.
itemListElement.name: to roast the dry fruits, heat 2 tbsp ghee.

itemListElement.text: add 5 cashew, 5 almonds, 2 tbsp raisins, 10 pistachios, 5 dates and 2 tbsp charoli.
itemListElement.name: add 5 cashew, 5 almonds, 2 tbsp raisins, 10 pistachios, 5 dates and 2 tbsp charoli.

itemListElement.text: saute until the nuts turn crunchy.
itemListElement.name: saute until the nuts turn crunchy.

itemListElement.text: pour in fried nuts and add ½ tsp cardamom powder. mix well making sure everything is well combined.
itemListElement.name: pour in fried nuts and add ½ tsp cardamom powder. mix well making sure everything is well combined.

itemListElement.text: finally, enjoy dry fruits kheer recipe topped with more nuts.

@graph.name: sheera recipe | rava sheera recipe | sooji sheera | sooji ka sheera
@graph.description: easy sheera recipe | rava sheera recipe | sooji sheera | sooji ka sheera

recipeInstructions.text: firstly, in a pan add 2 tbsp ghee and roast 7 cashew, 2 tbsp raisins on low flame.
recipeInstructions.name: firstly, in a pan add 2 tbsp ghee and roast 7 cashew, 2 tbsp raisins on low flame.

recipeInstructions.text: once it turns golden brown, keep aside.
recipeInstructions.name: once it turns golden brown, keep aside.

recipeInstructions.text: in the remaining ghee add ½ cup rava and roast for 5 minutes on low flame. keep aside.
recipeInstructions.name: in the remaining ghee add ½ cup rava and roast for 5 minutes on low flame. keep aside.

recipeInstructions.text: in a large kadai get 1½ cup water to a rolling boil.
recipeInstructions.name: in a large kadai get 1½ cup water to a rolling boil.

recipeInstructions.text: add roasted rava slowly, stirring continuously.
recipeInstructions.name: add roasted rava slowly, stirring continuously.

recipeInstructions.text: the rava will absorb all the water and turns a lump-free mixture.
recipeInstructions.name: the rava will absorb all the water and turns a lump-free mixture.

recipeInstructions.text: now add ½ cup sugar and continue to stir.
recipeInstructions.name: now add ½ cup sugar and continue to stir.

recipeInstructions.text: sugar dissolves completely and gets absorbed by rava.
recipeInstructions.name: sugar dissolves completely and gets absorbed by rava.

recipeInstructions.text: further add ¼ cup ghee and 3 drops yellow food colour. adding food colour is completely optional.
recipeInstructions.name: further add ¼ cup ghee and 3 drops yellow food colour. adding food colour is completely optional.

recipeInstructions.text: now mix well making sure everything is well combined.
recipeInstructions.name: now mix well making sure everything is well combined.

recipeInstructions.text: cover and simmer for 5 minutes making sure rava is cooked completely.
recipeInstructions.name: cover and simmer for 5 minutes making sure rava is cooked completely.

recipeInstructions.text: further add roasted cashew, raisins and ½ tsp cardamom powder.
recipeInstructions.name: further add roasted cashew, raisins and ½ tsp cardamom powder.

recipeInstructions.text: mix well making sure everything is well combined.
recipeInstructions.name: mix well making sure everything is well combined.

recipeInstructions.text: finally, enjoy sheera with khara bath or serve as prasada.
recipeInstructions.name: finally, enjoy sheera with khara bath or serve as prasada.

recipeInstructions.text: ಮೊದಲನೆಯದಾಗಿ, ಒಂದು ದೊಡ್ಡ ಬಟ್ಟಲಿನಲ್ಲಿ 1 ಕಪ್ ಬೆಸಾನ್, ¼ ಕಪ್ ಮೈಡಾ, ¾ ಟೀಸ್ಪೂನ್ ಬೇಕಿಂಗ್ ಪೌಡರ್, ¼ ಟೀಸ್ಪೂನ್ ಅರಿಶಿನ ಮತ್ತು ½ ಟೀಸ್ಪೂನ್ ಉಪ್ಪು ತೆಗೆದುಕೊಳ್ಳಿ.

recipeInstructions.text: 1¼ ಕಪ್ ನೀರು ಸೇರಿಸಿ ಚೆನ್ನಾಗಿ ಮಿಶ್ರಣ ಮಾಡಿ.
recipeInstructions.name: 1¼ ಕಪ್ ನೀರು ಸೇರಿಸಿ ಚೆನ್ನಾಗಿ ಮಿಶ್ರಣ ಮಾಡಿ.

recipeInstructions.text: ಹಿಟ್ಟು ರೂಪುಗೊಳ್ಳುವವರೆಗೆ ಮಿಶ್ರಣ ಮಾಡಿ.
recipeInstructions.name: ಹಿಟ್ಟು ರೂಪುಗೊಳ್ಳುವವರೆಗೆ ಮಿಶ್ರಣ ಮಾಡಿ.

recipeInstructions.text: ಈಗ 2 ಟೀಸ್ಪೂನ್ ಈರುಳ್ಳಿ, 1 ಮೆಣಸಿನಕಾಯಿ, 2 ಟೀಸ್ಪೂನ್ ಕೊತ್ತಂಬರಿ, ¼ ಟೀಸ್ಪೂನ್ ಮೆಣಸಿನ ಪುಡಿ ಮತ್ತು ¼ ಟೀಸ್ಪೂನ್ ಮೆಣಸು ಪುಡಿ ಸೇರಿಸಿ.

recipeInstructions.text: ಎಲ್ಲವನ್ನೂ ಚೆನ್ನಾಗಿ ಸಂಯೋಜಿಸಲಾಗಿದೆ ಎಂದು ಖಚಿತಪಡಿಸಿಕೊಳ್ಳಲು ಚೆನ್ನಾಗಿ ಮಿಶ್ರಣ ಮಾಡಿ.

recipeInstructions.text: ಪ್ಯಾನ್ ಅನ್ನು ಬಿಸಿ ಮಾಡಿ, ಒಂದು ಚಮಚ ಬೆಣ್ಣೆ ಮತ್ತು 1 ಟೀಸ್ಪೂನ್ ಕೊತ್ತಂಬರಿ ಸೇರಿಸಿ. ಏಕರೂಪವಾಗಿ ಹರಡುವುದನ್ನು ಖಚಿತಪಡಿಸಿಕೊಳ್ಳಿ.

recipeInstructions.text: ಆಮ್ಲೆಟ್ ಹಿಟ್ಟು ಒಂದು ಸೌಟು ಅನ್ನು ಸುರಿಯಿರಿ, ಸುತ್ತು ಮತ್ತು ಏಕರೂಪವಾಗಿ ಹರಡಿ.

recipeInstructions.text: ಒಂದು ನಿಮಿಷದ ನಂತರ, ಹಿಟ್ಟು ಕೆಳಗಿನಿಂದ ಬೇಯಿಸಲಾಗುತ್ತದೆ.

recipeInstructions.text: firstly, in a large bowl take 2½ cup wheat flour, 1 tsp sugar, 1 tsp baking powder, ¼ tsp baking soda and ½ tsp salt.
recipeInstructions.name: firstly, in a large bowl take 2½ cup wheat flour, 1 tsp sugar, 1 tsp baking powder, ¼ tsp baking soda and ½ tsp salt.

recipeInstructions.text: mix well making sure everything is well combined.
recipeInstructions.name: mix well making sure everything is well combined.

recipeInstructions.text: now add ½ cup curd and start to knead the dough.
recipeInstructions.name: now add ½ cup curd and start to knead the dough.

recipeInstructions.text: add water as required and continue to knead for 5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: add water as required and continue to knead for 5 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: now add 2 tbsp oil and knead until the dough turns fdmooth and soft.
recipeInstructions.name: now add 2 tbsp oil and knead until the dough turns fdmooth and soft.

recipeInstructions.text: cover and rest for 1 hour or more.
recipeInstructions.name: cover and rest for 1 hour or more.

recipeInstructions.text: after 1 hour, kenad the dough again making sure the dough is soft.
recipeInstructions.name: after 1 hour, kenad the dough again making sure the dough is soft.

recipeInstructions.text: pinch a ball sized dough and dust with wheat flour.
recipeInstructions.name: pinch a ball sized dough and dust with wheat flour.

recipeInstructions.text: roll gently, making sure the roti is slightly thick.
recipeInstructions.name: roll gently, making sure the roti is slightly thick.

recipeInstructions.text: now sprinkle some water and spread uniformly.
recipeInstructions.name: now sprinkle some water and spread uniformly.

recipeInstructions.text: heat the tawa on medium flame, and once the tawa is hot transfer the roti onto the tawa.
recipeInstructions.name: heat the tawa on medium flame, and once the tawa is hot transfer the roti onto the tawa.

recipeInstructions.text: make sure the waterside is facing down. press gently, so that the roti sticks to the pan.
recipeInstructions.name: make sure the waterside is facing down. press gently, so that the roti sticks to the pan.

recipeInstructions.text: cook for a minute or until the roti partially puffs up and the base gets cooked up.
recipeInstructions.name: cook for a minute or until the roti partially puffs up and the base gets cooked up.

recipeInstructions.text: now flip the tawa onto the flame and cook until the roti is cooked uniformly.
recipeInstructions.name: now flip the tawa onto the flame and cook until the roti is cooked uniformly.

recipeInstructions.text: don't worry if there are some black spots appearing. it gives a tandoor effect.
recipeInstructions.name: don't worry if there are some black spots appearing. it gives a tandoor effect.

recipeInstructions.text: scrape the roti and make sure the roti is cooked completely from all the sides.
recipeInstructions.name: scrape the roti and make sure the roti is cooked completely from all the sides.

recipeInstructions.text: finally, brush the tandoori roti with butter and enjoy with curry.

recipeInstructions.name: how to marinate for biryani:

itemListElement.text: firstly, in a boil take 1 cup curd. add 1 tsp chilli powder, ¼ tsp turmeric, 2 tsp ginger garlic paste, 2 tbsp biryani masala and ½ tsp salt.
itemListElement.name: firstly, in a boil take 1 cup curd. add 1 tsp chilli powder, ¼ tsp turmeric, 2 tsp ginger garlic paste, 2 tbsp biryani masala and ½ tsp salt.

itemListElement.text: also add ½ lemon, 2 tsp oil and mix well.
itemListElement.name: also add ½ lemon, 2 tsp oil and mix well.

itemListElement.text: now add 2 cup raw jackfruit, 1 carrot, 4 potato and 2 tbsp fried onions.
itemListElement.name: now add 2 cup raw jackfruit, 1 carrot, 4 potato and 2 tbsp fried onions.

itemListElement.text: additionally, add 2 tbsp coriander, 2 tbsp mint and mix well.
itemListElement.name: additionally, add 2 tbsp coriander, 2 tbsp mint and mix well.

itemListElement.text: cover and marinate for 1 hour.
itemListElement.name: cover and marinate for 1 hour.

recipeInstructions.name: how to cook rice for biryani:

itemListElement.text: firstly, in a bowl take 2 cup basmati rice. rinse and soak for 30 minutes.
itemListElement.name: firstly, in a bowl take 2 cup basmati rice. rinse and soak for 30 minutes.

itemListElement.text: in a large vessel take 3 litre water, add 1 bay leaf and whole spices.
itemListElement.name: in a large vessel take 3 litre water, add 1 bay leaf and whole spices.

itemListElement.text: also, add 2 chilli, 2 tbsp salt, 1 tsp ghee and ½ lemon.
itemListElement.name: also, add 2 chilli, 2 tbsp salt, 1 tsp ghee and ½ lemon.

itemListElement.text: get the water to a rolling boil making sure the water is flavourful.
itemListElement.name: get the water to a rolling boil making sure the water is flavourful.

itemListElement.text: now add soaked rice and mix well.
itemListElement.name: now add soaked rice and mix well.

itemListElement.text: boil for 5 minutes, or until it is 90% cooked.
itemListElement.name: boil for 5 minutes, or until it is 90% cooked.

itemListElement.text: drain off the rice and is ready to layer it for biryani.
itemListElement.name: drain off the rice and is ready to layer it for biryani.

recipeInstructions.name: how to make biryani base:

itemListElement.text: firstly, in a large kadai heat 2 tbsp oil, 2 tbsp ghee. add 1 bay leaf, 1 tsp cumin and saute until the spices turn aromatic.
itemListElement.name: firstly, in a large kadai heat 2 tbsp oil, 2 tbsp ghee. add 1 bay leaf, 1 tsp cumin and saute until the spices turn aromatic.

itemListElement.text: now add 1 onion and fry until the onions turn golden brown.
itemListElement.name: now add 1 onion and fry until the onions turn golden brown.

itemListElement.text: also add ½ capsicum, and saute for a minute.
itemListElement.name: also add ½ capsicum, and saute for a minute.

itemListElement.text: additonally, add marinated mixture and cook for 5 minutes.
itemListElement.name: additonally, add marinated mixture and cook for 5 minutes.

itemListElement.text: cook until the oil separates.
itemListElement.name: cook until the oil separates.

itemListElement.text: add 1 cup water, cover and cook for 10 minutes, or until the vegetables are almost cooked.
itemListElement.name: add 1 cup water, cover and cook for 10 minutes, or until the vegetables are almost cooked.

itemListElement.text: mix well and layer with 2 tbsp coriander, mint, fried onions and 2 slit chilli.
itemListElement.name: mix well and layer with 2 tbsp coriander, mint, fried onions and 2 slit chilli.

itemListElement.text: also, top with 90% cooked rice and spread uniformly.
itemListElement.name: also, top with 90% cooked rice and spread uniformly.

itemListElement.text: further top with 2 tbsp coriander, mint and fried onions.
itemListElement.name: further top with 2 tbsp coriander, mint and fried onions.

itemListElement.text: additionally, add 2 tbsp kesar milk, ½ tsp biryani masala and 1 tbsp ghee.
itemListElement.name: additionally, add 2 tbsp kesar milk, ½ tsp biryani masala and 1 tbsp ghee.

itemListElement.text: cover with aluminium foil to seal tight.
itemListElement.name: cover with aluminium foil to seal tight.

itemListElement.text: cover and simmer for 15 minutes or until the rice and everything is well cooked.
itemListElement.name: cover and simmer for 15 minutes or until the rice and everything is well cooked.

itemListElement.text: finally, veg mutton biryani with raita and salan.
itemListElement.name: finally, veg mutton biryani with raita and salan.

recipeInstructions.text: ಮೊದಲಿಗೆ, ಒತ್ತಡದ ಕುಕ್ಕರ್ ನಲ್ಲಿ 1 ಕಪ್ ನೆನೆಸಿದ ಬಿಳಿ ಬಟಾಣಿ (ವಟನಾ), 1 ಆಲೂಗಡ್ಡೆ, ¼ ಟೀಸ್ಪೂನ್ ಅರಿಶಿನ, ½ ಟೀಸ್ಪೂನ್ ಉಪ್ಪು ಮತ್ತು 3 ಕಪ್ ನೀರನ್ನು ತೆಗೆದುಕೊಳ್ಳಿ.

@graph.name: tandoori roti recipe in toaster | tandoori roti maker for home
@graph.description: easy tandoori roti recipe in toaster | tandoori roti maker for home

recipeInstructions.text: firstly, in a large mixing bowl take 2 cups of wheat flour.
recipeInstructions.name: firstly, in a large mixing bowl take 2 cups of wheat flour.

recipeInstructions.text: further add in ½ tsp sugar, 1 tsp baking powder and salt to taste.
recipeInstructions.name: further add in ½ tsp sugar, 1 tsp baking powder and salt to taste.

recipeInstructions.text: also add in ¼ cup curd and 1 tbsp oil.
recipeInstructions.name: also add in ¼ cup curd and 1 tbsp oil.

recipeInstructions.text: combine all the ingredients well.
recipeInstructions.name: combine all the ingredients well.

recipeInstructions.text: additionally, add in water as required and knead the dough.
recipeInstructions.name: additionally, add in water as required and knead the dough.

recipeInstructions.text: knead 5 minutes or more to get smooth and soft dough.
recipeInstructions.name: knead 5 minutes or more to get smooth and soft dough.

recipeInstructions.text: cover with the moist cloth and rest for 20 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: cover with the moist cloth and rest for 20 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: again knead slightly, making sure the dough is smooth and soft.
recipeInstructions.name: again knead slightly, making sure the dough is smooth and soft.

recipeInstructions.text: pinch a small ball sized dough.
recipeInstructions.name: pinch a small ball sized dough.

recipeInstructions.text: make a ball and flatten it slightly.
recipeInstructions.name: make a ball and flatten it slightly.

recipeInstructions.text: dust with wheat flour before rolling.
recipeInstructions.name: dust with wheat flour before rolling.

recipeInstructions.text: roll the dough slightly thick to 5 inch diameter. (depending on the size of toaster)
recipeInstructions.name: roll the dough slightly thick to 5 inch diameter. (depending on the size of toaster)

recipeInstructions.text: now roast the roti on hot tawa.
recipeInstructions.name: now roast the roti on hot tawa.

recipeInstructions.text: half cook the roti both the sides.
recipeInstructions.name: half cook the roti both the sides.

recipeInstructions.text: now transfer the half cooked roti into the toaster.
recipeInstructions.name: now transfer the half cooked roti into the toaster.

recipeInstructions.text: and turn on the toaster. i have kept the setting to meter 2. however, adjust the meter accordingly and it takes the same heat as required to toast the bread.
recipeInstructions.name: and turn on the toaster. i have kept the setting to meter 2. however, adjust the meter accordingly and it takes the same heat as required to toast the bread.

recipeInstructions.text: wait till the tandoori roti pops up and puffs up.
recipeInstructions.name: wait till the tandoori roti pops up and puffs up.

recipeInstructions.text: now using the forceps place the tandoori roti on to the plate.
recipeInstructions.name: now using the forceps place the tandoori roti on to the plate.

recipeInstructions.text: brush with generous amount of butter.
recipeInstructions.name: brush with generous amount of butter.

recipeInstructions.text: finally, serve tandoori roti prepared from toaster along with palak paneer.
recipeInstructions.name: finally, serve tandoori roti prepared from toaster along with palak paneer.

recipeInstructions.name: notes:

itemListElement.text: ಹಾಲು ಕುದಿಯಲು ಬಂದ ನಂತರ, 2 ಟೇಬಲ್ಸ್ಪೂನ್ ನಿಂಬೆ ರಸವನ್ನು ಸೇರಿಸಿ. ನೀವು ಪರ್ಯಾಯವಾಗಿ ಮೊಸರು ಅಥವಾ ವಿನೆಗರ್ ಸೇರಿಸಬಹುದು.
itemListElement.name: ಹಾಲು ಕುದಿಯಲು ಬಂದ ನಂತರ, 2 ಟೇಬಲ್ಸ್ಪೂನ್ ನಿಂಬೆ ರಸವನ್ನು ಸೇರಿಸಿ. ನೀವು ಪರ್ಯಾಯವಾಗಿ ಮೊಸರು ಅಥವಾ ವಿನೆಗರ್ ಸೇರಿಸಬಹುದು.

itemListElement.text: ಹಾಲು ಮೊಸರಾಗುವವರೆಗೆ ಮಧ್ಯಮ ಉರಿಯಲ್ಲಿ ಚೆನ್ನಾಗಿ ಬೆರೆಸಿ.
itemListElement.name: ಹಾಲು ಮೊಸರಾಗುವವರೆಗೆ ಮಧ್ಯಮ ಉರಿಯಲ್ಲಿ ಚೆನ್ನಾಗಿ ಬೆರೆಸಿ.

itemListElement.text: ಹಾಲು ಮತ್ತು ನೀರನ್ನು ಸಂಪೂರ್ಣವಾಗಿ ಪ್ರತ್ಯೇಕಿಸಲು ಹೆಚ್ಚು ನಿಂಬೆ ರಸ ಅಥವಾ ಮೊಸರು / ವಿನೆಗರ್ ಸೇರಿಸಲು ಹಿಂಜರಿಯಬೇಡಿ.
itemListElement.name: ಹಾಲು ಮತ್ತು ನೀರನ್ನು ಸಂಪೂರ್ಣವಾಗಿ ಪ್ರತ್ಯೇಕಿಸಲು ಹೆಚ್ಚು ನಿಂಬೆ ರಸ ಅಥವಾ ಮೊಸರು / ವಿನೆಗರ್ ಸೇರಿಸಲು ಹಿಂಜರಿಯಬೇಡಿ.

itemListElement.text: ಮೊಸರು ಹಾಕಿದ ಹಾಲನ್ನು ಒಂದು ಕೋಲಾಂಡರ್ ಮೇಲೆ ಬಟ್ಟೆಯ ಮೇಲೆ ಹಾಕಿ. ನೀವು ಸೂಪ್ ಅಥವಾ ಹಿಟ್ಟನ್ನು ತಯಾರಿಸಲು ಉಳಿದ ನೀರನ್ನು ಬಳಸಬಹುದು, ಏಕೆಂದರೆ ಅವು ತುಂಬಾ ಪೌಷ್ಟಿಕಾಂಶದಿಂದ ಕೂಡಿರುತ್ತವೆ.
itemListElement.name: ಮೊಸರು ಹಾಕಿದ ಹಾಲನ್ನು ಒಂದು ಕೋಲಾಂಡರ್ ಮೇಲೆ ಬಟ್ಟೆಯ ಮೇಲೆ ಹಾಕಿ. ನೀವು ಸೂಪ್ ಅಥವಾ ಹಿಟ್ಟನ್ನು ತಯಾರಿಸಲು ಉಳಿದ ನೀರನ್ನು ಬಳಸಬಹುದು, ಏಕೆಂದರೆ ಅವು ತುಂಬಾ ಪೌಷ್ಟಿಕಾಂಶದಿಂದ ಕೂಡಿರುತ್ತವೆ.

itemListElement.text: ನಿಂಬೆ ರಸದಿಂದ ಹುಳಿ ತೆಗೆಯಲು ಒಡೆದ ಹಾಲನ್ನು ಶುದ್ಧ ನೀರಿನಿಂದ ತೊಳೆಯಿರಿ.
itemListElement.name: ನಿಂಬೆ ರಸದಿಂದ ಹುಳಿ ತೆಗೆಯಲು ಒಡೆದ ಹಾಲನ್ನು ಶುದ್ಧ ನೀರಿನಿಂದ ತೊಳೆಯಿರಿ.

itemListElement.text: ನೀರನ್ನು ಸಂಪೂರ್ಣವಾಗಿ ಹಿಸುಕು ಹಾಕಿ. ಒಡೆದ ಹಾಲು ತುಂಬಾ ಬಿಸಿಯಾಗಿರುವುದರಿಂದ ಜಾಗರೂಕರಾಗಿರಿ.
itemListElement.name: ನೀರನ್ನು ಸಂಪೂರ್ಣವಾಗಿ ಹಿಸುಕು ಹಾಕಿ. ಒಡೆದ ಹಾಲು ತುಂಬಾ ಬಿಸಿಯಾಗಿರುವುದರಿಂದ ಜಾಗರೂಕರಾಗಿರಿ.

itemListElement.text: 10 ನಿಮಿಷಗಳ ಕಾಲ ಅಥವಾ ನೀರನ್ನು ಸಂಪೂರ್ಣವಾಗಿ ಹೊರಹಾಕುವವರೆಗೆ ವಿಶ್ರಾಂತಿ ಮಾಡಿ.

recipeInstructions.name: ತ್ವರಿತ ಖೋವಾ ತಯಾರಿಕೆ:

itemListElement.text: ಏತನ್ಮಧ್ಯೆ, ½ ಟೀಸ್ಪೂನ್ ತುಪ್ಪ, ¼ ಕಪ್ ಹಾಲು ಮತ್ತು ¼ ಕಪ್ ಕ್ರೀಮ್ ಅನ್ನು ಬಿಸಿ ಮಾಡುವ ಮೂಲಕ ಮಾವಾ ತಯಾರಿಸಿ.
itemListElement.name: ಏತನ್ಮಧ್ಯೆ, ½ ಟೀಸ್ಪೂನ್ ತುಪ್ಪ, ¼ ಕಪ್ ಹಾಲು ಮತ್ತು ¼ ಕಪ್ ಕ್ರೀಮ್ ಅನ್ನು ಬಿಸಿ ಮಾಡುವ ಮೂಲಕ ಮಾವಾ ತಯಾರಿಸಿ.

itemListElement.text: ಬೆಣ್ಣೆ ಮತ್ತು ಹಾಲನ್ನು ಚೆನ್ನಾಗಿ ಸಂಯೋಜಿಸಲಾಗಿದೆ ಎಂದು ಖಚಿತಪಡಿಸಿಕೊಳ್ಳಿ.
itemListElement.name: ಬೆಣ್ಣೆ ಮತ್ತು ಹಾಲನ್ನು ಚೆನ್ನಾಗಿ ಸಂಯೋಜಿಸಲಾಗಿದೆ ಎಂದು ಖಚಿತಪಡಿಸಿಕೊಳ್ಳಿ.

itemListElement.text: ಈಗ ¾ ಕಪ್ ಪೂರ್ಣ ಕೆನೆ ಹಾಲಿನ ಪುಡಿಯನ್ನು ಸೇರಿಸಿ.
itemListElement.name: ಈಗ ¾ ಕಪ್ ಪೂರ್ಣ ಕೆನೆ ಹಾಲಿನ ಪುಡಿಯನ್ನು ಸೇರಿಸಿ.

itemListElement.text: ಜ್ವಾಲೆಯನ್ನು ಕಡಿಮೆ ಇರಿಸಿ, ನಿರಂತರವಾಗಿ ಬೆರೆಸಿ.
itemListElement.name: ಜ್ವಾಲೆಯನ್ನು ಕಡಿಮೆ ಇರಿಸಿ, ನಿರಂತರವಾಗಿ ಬೆರೆಸಿ.

itemListElement.text: ಮಿಶ್ರಣವು ದಪ್ಪವಾಗಲು ಪ್ರಾರಂಭಿಸುತ್ತದೆ.

itemListElement.text: 5 ನಿಮಿಷಗಳ ನಂತರ, ಮಿಶ್ರಣವು ಪ್ಯಾನ್‌ನಿಂದ ಬೇರ್ಪಡಿಸಲು ಪ್ರಾರಂಭಿಸುತ್ತದೆ.

itemListElement.text: ಅದು ಉಂಡೆಯನ್ನು ರೂಪಿಸುವವರೆಗೆ ಮಿಶ್ರಣ ಮಾಡಿ. ಅಂತಿಮವಾಗಿ, ತ್ವರಿತ ಖೋಯಾ ಸಿದ್ಧವಾಗಿದೆ.

itemListElement.text: ಮಿಶ್ರಣವು ಪ್ಯಾನ್ ಅನ್ನು ಬೇರ್ಪಡಿಸಲು ಮತ್ತು ಆಕಾರವನ್ನು ಹಿಡಿದಿಡಲು ಪ್ರಾರಂಭಿಸುವವರೆಗೆ ಕಲುಕುತ್ತಿರಿ.

recipeIngredient: ½ टी स्पून  काली मिर्च (कुचला हुआ)

recipeInstructions.text: सबसे पहले, प्रेशर कुकर में 2 टेबलस्पून तेल और 2 पुत्थी लहसुन और 1 इंच अदरक को गर्म करें।
recipeInstructions.name: सबसे पहले, प्रेशर कुकर में 2 टेबलस्पून तेल और 2 पुत्थी लहसुन और 1 इंच अदरक को गर्म करें।

recipeInstructions.text: एक मिनट के लिए ½ प्याज साट करें।
recipeInstructions.name: एक मिनट के लिए ½ प्याज साट करें।

recipeInstructions.text: 4 गाजर, ¼ आलू और 1 टीस्पून नमक भी डालें।
recipeInstructions.name: 4 गाजर, ¼ आलू और 1 टीस्पून नमक भी डालें।

recipeInstructions.text: अब 2 कप पानी और कुछ पुदीने की पत्तियाँ डालें।
recipeInstructions.name: अब 2 कप पानी और कुछ पुदीने की पत्तियाँ डालें।

recipeInstructions.text: कवर करें और 4 सीटी या गाजर के पूरी तरह से पकने तक प्रेशर कुक करें।
recipeInstructions.name: कवर करें और 4 सीटी या गाजर के पूरी तरह से पकने तक प्रेशर कुक करें।

@graph.name: Lemon Rasam Recipe | Nimbu Rasam Recipe | South Indian Lemon Rasam
@graph.description: Easy Lemon Rasam Recipe | Nimbu Rasam Recipe | South Indian Lemon Rasam

recipeInstructions.text: Firstly, in a pressure cooker take 1 cup toor dal, 1 tomato, 5 chilli, 1 inch ginger and few curry leaves.
recipeInstructions.name: Firstly, in a pressure cooker take 1 cup toor dal, 1 tomato, 5 chilli, 1 inch ginger and few curry leaves.

recipeInstructions.text: Also add ½ tsp turmeric, 1 tsp salt, 1 tsp oil and 3 cup water.
recipeInstructions.name: Also add ½ tsp turmeric, 1 tsp salt, 1 tsp oil and 3 cup water.

recipeInstructions.text: Pressure cook for 5 whistles or until the dal is cooked well.
recipeInstructions.name: Pressure cook for 5 whistles or until the dal is cooked well.

recipeInstructions.text: Whisk the dal to make it a silky smooth texture.
recipeInstructions.name: Whisk the dal to make it a silky smooth texture.

recipeInstructions.text: Pour in 3 cup water, ½ tsp salt and ½ tsp pepper. Mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: Pour in 3 cup water, ½ tsp salt and ½ tsp pepper. Mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: Boil for 3 minutes or until flavours are well absorbed.
recipeInstructions.name: Boil for 3 minutes or until flavours are well absorbed.

recipeInstructions.text: Now to prepare the tempering, heat 2 tbsp ghee. Add, 1 tsp mustard, 1 tsp cumin, pinch hing, 2 dried red chilli and few curry leaves.
recipeInstructions.name: Now to prepare the tempering, heat 2 tbsp ghee. Add, 1 tsp mustard, 1 tsp cumin, pinch hing, 2 dried red chilli and few curry leaves.

recipeInstructions.text: Splutter the tempering and pour over rasam.
recipeInstructions.name: Splutter the tempering and pour over rasam.

recipeInstructions.text: Also add 2 tbsp coriander, ½ lemon and mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: Also add 2 tbsp coriander, ½ lemon and mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: Finally, enjoy Lemon Rasam Recipe with hot steamed rice.
recipeInstructions.name: Finally, enjoy Lemon Rasam Recipe with hot steamed rice.

recipeInstructions.text: ಮೊದಲನೆಯದಾಗಿ, ಕಡಿಮೆ ಉರಿಯಲ್ಲಿ ತವಾಕ್ಕೆ ¼ ಕಪ್ ಉದ್ದಿನ ಬೇಳೆ ಸೇರಿಸಿ ಡ್ರೈ ರೋಸ್ಟ್ ಮಾಡಿ.
recipeInstructions.name: ಮೊದಲನೆಯದಾಗಿ, ಕಡಿಮೆ ಉರಿಯಲ್ಲಿ ತವಾಕ್ಕೆ ¼ ಕಪ್ ಉದ್ದಿನ ಬೇಳೆ ಸೇರಿಸಿ ಡ್ರೈ ರೋಸ್ಟ್ ಮಾಡಿ.

recipeInstructions.text: ಉದ್ದಿನ ಬೆಳೆ ಪರಿಮಳ ಬರುವವರೆಗೆ ಹುರಿಯಿರಿ.

recipeInstructions.text: ಸಂಪೂರ್ಣವಾಗಿ ತಣ್ಣಗಾಗಿಸಿ, ಮತ್ತು ಉತ್ತಮ ಪುಡಿಗೆ ರುಬ್ಬಿಕೊಳ್ಳಿ.
recipeInstructions.name: ಸಂಪೂರ್ಣವಾಗಿ ತಣ್ಣಗಾಗಿಸಿ, ಮತ್ತು ಉತ್ತಮ ಪುಡಿಗೆ ರುಬ್ಬಿಕೊಳ್ಳಿ.

recipeInstructions.text: ಉದ್ದಿನ ಹಿಟ್ಟಗೆ ಜರಡಿ ಹಿಡಿಯಿರಿ. ಪರ್ಯಾಯವಾಗಿ, ಅಂಗಡಿಯು ಉದ್ದಿನ ಹಿಟ್ಟನ್ನು ಬಳಸಬಹುದು.
recipeInstructions.name: ಉದ್ದಿನ ಹಿಟ್ಟಗೆ ಜರಡಿ ಹಿಡಿಯಿರಿ. ಪರ್ಯಾಯವಾಗಿ, ಅಂಗಡಿಯು ಉದ್ದಿನ ಹಿಟ್ಟನ್ನು ಬಳಸಬಹುದು.

recipeInstructions.text: 1¼ ಕಪ್ ಅಕ್ಕಿ ಹಿಟ್ಟು, 1 ಟೇಬಲ್ಸ್ಪೂನ್ ಬೆಣ್ಣೆ, 1 ಟೀಸ್ಪೂನ್ ಜೀರಿಗೆ, ಚಿಟಿಕೆ ಹಿಂಗ್ ಮತ್ತು ¾ ಟೀಸ್ಪೂನ್ ಉಪ್ಪು ಸೇರಿಸಿ.

recipeInstructions.text: ಮುಂದೆ, ಅಗತ್ಯವಿರುವಂತೆ ನೀರನ್ನು ಸೇರಿಸಿ ಮತ್ತು ಹಿಟ್ಟನ್ನು ನಾದಿಕೊಳ್ಳಿ.

recipeInstructions.text: ನಯವಾದ ಮತ್ತು ಮೃದುವಾದ ಹಿಟ್ಟನ್ನು ನಾದಿಕೊಳ್ಳಿ. ಹಿಟ್ಟು ತುಂಬಾ ಗಟ್ಟಿಯಾಗಿದ್ದರೆ ನೀವು ಅಚ್ಚನ್ನು ಬಳಸಿ ಅವುಗಳನ್ನು ರೂಪಿಸಲು ಪ್ರಯತ್ನಿಸಿದಾಗ ಮುರುಕ್ಕು ಮುರಿಯುತ್ತದೆ. ಹಿಟ್ಟು ತುಂಬಾ ಮೃದುವಾಗಿದ್ದರೆ ಮುರುಕ್ಕು ಎಣ್ಣೆಯನ್ನು ಹೀರಿಕೊಳ್ಳುತ್ತದೆ. ಆದ್ದರಿಂದ ನಯವಾದ ಹಿಟ್ಟನ್ನು ತಯಾರಿಸಲು ಖಚಿತಪಡಿಸಿಕೊಳ್ಳಿ.

recipeInstructions.text: ಈಗ 4 ಹೋಲ್ಡ್ ಅಚ್ಚನ್ನು ತೆಗೆದುಕೊಂಡು ಚಕ್ಲಿ ಮೇಕರ್ ಗೆ ಇರಿಸಿ.
recipeInstructions.name: ಈಗ 4 ಹೋಲ್ಡ್ ಅಚ್ಚನ್ನು ತೆಗೆದುಕೊಂಡು ಚಕ್ಲಿ ಮೇಕರ್ ಗೆ ಇರಿಸಿ.

recipeInstructions.text: ಚಕ್ಲಿ ಮೇಕರ್ ಅನ್ನು ಸ್ವಲ್ಪ ಎಣ್ಣೆಯಿಂದ ಗ್ರೀಸ್ ಮಾಡಿ. ಇದು ಹಿಟ್ಟನ್ನು ಅಚ್ಚಿಗೆ ಅಂಟದಂತೆ ತಡೆಯುತ್ತದೆ.
recipeInstructions.name: ಚಕ್ಲಿ ಮೇಕರ್ ಅನ್ನು ಸ್ವಲ್ಪ ಎಣ್ಣೆಯಿಂದ ಗ್ರೀಸ್ ಮಾಡಿ. ಇದು ಹಿಟ್ಟನ್ನು ಅಚ್ಚಿಗೆ ಅಂಟದಂತೆ ತಡೆಯುತ್ತದೆ.

recipeInstructions.text: ಇದಲ್ಲದೆ, ಹಿಟ್ಟಿನ್ನು ಸಿಲಿಂಡರಾಕಾರದ ಆಕಾರಕ್ಕೆ ಮಾಡಿ ಮತ್ತು ಹಿಟ್ಟನ್ನು ಅದರ ಒಳಗೆ ಇರಿಸಿ.
recipeInstructions.name: ಇದಲ್ಲದೆ, ಹಿಟ್ಟಿನ್ನು ಸಿಲಿಂಡರಾಕಾರದ ಆಕಾರಕ್ಕೆ ಮಾಡಿ ಮತ್ತು ಹಿಟ್ಟನ್ನು ಅದರ ಒಳಗೆ ಇರಿಸಿ.

recipeInstructions.text: ಮುಚ್ಚಳವನ್ನು ಬಿಗಿಗೊಳಿಸಿ, ಥೆಂಕುಜ್ಹಾಲ್ ಮುರುಕ್ಕು ತಯಾರಿಸಲು ಪ್ರಾರಂಭಿಸಿ.
recipeInstructions.name: ಮುಚ್ಚಳವನ್ನು ಬಿಗಿಗೊಳಿಸಿ, ಥೆಂಕುಜ್ಹಾಲ್ ಮುರುಕ್ಕು ತಯಾರಿಸಲು ಪ್ರಾರಂಭಿಸಿ.

recipeInstructions.text: ಗ್ರೀಸ್ ಮಾಡಿದ ಚುಕ್ಕೆ ಸೌಟಿನ ಮೇಲೆ, ಒತ್ತುವ ಮೂಲಕ ಸಣ್ಣ ಸುರುಳಿಯಾಕಾರದ ಮುರುಕ್ಕು ತಯಾರಿಸಿ.
recipeInstructions.name: ಗ್ರೀಸ್ ಮಾಡಿದ ಚುಕ್ಕೆ ಸೌಟಿನ ಮೇಲೆ, ಒತ್ತುವ ಮೂಲಕ ಸಣ್ಣ ಸುರುಳಿಯಾಕಾರದ ಮುರುಕ್ಕು ತಯಾರಿಸಿ.

recipeInstructions.text: ಆಳವಾಗಿ ಹುರಿಯುವಾಗ ಅದು ಬೀಳದಂತೆ ತುದಿಗಳನ್ನು ಮುಚ್ಚಿ.
recipeInstructions.name: ಆಳವಾಗಿ ಹುರಿಯುವಾಗ ಅದು ಬೀಳದಂತೆ ತುದಿಗಳನ್ನು ಮುಚ್ಚಿ.

recipeInstructions.text: ಮುರುಕ್ಕು ಬಿಸಿ ಎಣ್ಣೆಯಲ್ಲಿ ಸ್ಲೈಡ್ ಮಾಡಿ. ಅಥವಾ ಪ್ರಿ ಹೀಟೆಡ್ ಓವೆನ್ ನಲ್ಲಿ 180 ಡಿಗ್ರಿ ಸೆಲ್ಸಿಯಸ್‌ನಲ್ಲಿ 15 ನಿಮಿಷಗಳ ಕಾಲ ತಯಾರಿಸಿ.
recipeInstructions.name: ಮುರುಕ್ಕು ಬಿಸಿ ಎಣ್ಣೆಯಲ್ಲಿ ಸ್ಲೈಡ್ ಮಾಡಿ. ಅಥವಾ ಪ್ರಿ ಹೀಟೆಡ್ ಓವೆನ್ ನಲ್ಲಿ 180 ಡಿಗ್ರಿ ಸೆಲ್ಸಿಯಸ್‌ನಲ್ಲಿ 15 ನಿಮಿಷಗಳ ಕಾಲ ತಯಾರಿಸಿ.

recipeInstructions.text: ಮುರುಕ್ಕುವನ್ನು ತಿರುಗಿಸಿ ಮತ್ತು ಮಧ್ಯಮ ಉರಿಯಲ್ಲಿ ಎರಡೂ ಕಡೆಯಿಂದ ಗರಿಗರಿಯಾಗುವವರೆಗೆ ಹುರಿಯಿರಿ.
recipeInstructions.name: ಮುರುಕ್ಕುವನ್ನು ತಿರುಗಿಸಿ ಮತ್ತು ಮಧ್ಯಮ ಉರಿಯಲ್ಲಿ ಎರಡೂ ಕಡೆಯಿಂದ ಗರಿಗರಿಯಾಗುವವರೆಗೆ ಹುರಿಯಿರಿ.

recipeInstructions.text: ಇದಲ್ಲದೆ, ಹೆಚ್ಚುವರಿ ಎಣ್ಣೆಯನ್ನು ತೆಗೆದುಹಾಕಲು ಕಾಗದದ ಟವಲ್ ಮೇಲೆ ಹರಿಸಿ.

recipeInstructions.text: ಅಂತಿಮವಾಗಿ, ಗರಿಗರಿಯಾದ ಮತ್ತು ಟೇಸ್ಟಿ ಥೆಂಕುಜ್ಹಾಲ್ ಮುರುಕ್ಕುವನ್ನು ಮಸಾಲಾ ಚಹಾ ಅಥವಾ ಮಸಾಲಾ ಹಾಲಿನೊಂದಿಗೆ ಬಡಿಸಿ.

recipeInstructions.name: How to make coconut jaggery stuffing:

itemListElement.text: Firstly, in a large kadai heat 1 tsp ghee and saute 2 cup coconut.
itemListElement.name: Firstly, in a large kadai heat 1 tsp ghee and saute 2 cup coconut.

itemListElement.text: Saute until the coconut turns aromatic.
itemListElement.name: Saute until the coconut turns aromatic.

itemListElement.text: Now add 1 cup of jaggery and mix well.
itemListElement.name: Now add 1 cup of jaggery and mix well.

itemListElement.text: Keep cooking on medium flame until the jaggery melts.
itemListElement.name: Keep cooking on medium flame until the jaggery melts.

itemListElement.text: Continue to cook until the mixture thickens and still remains moist.
itemListElement.name: Continue to cook until the mixture thickens and still remains moist.

itemListElement.text: Now add ½ tsp cardamom powder and mix well. Stuffing is ready, keep it aside.
itemListElement.name: Now add ½ tsp cardamom powder and mix well. Stuffing is ready, keep it aside.

recipeInstructions.name: How to make Modak dough:

itemListElement.text: Firstly, in a large kadai take 2 cup water, ½ tsp salt, and 1 tsp ghee.
itemListElement.name: Firstly, in a large kadai take 2 cup water, ½ tsp salt, and 1 tsp ghee.

itemListElement.text: Mix well and bring the water to a boil.
itemListElement.name: Mix well and bring the water to a boil.

itemListElement.text: Further, add 2 cup rice flour and mix gently.
itemListElement.name: Further, add 2 cup rice flour and mix gently.

itemListElement.text: Mix until the rice flour absorbs all the water.
itemListElement.name: Mix until the rice flour absorbs all the water.

itemListElement.text: Cover and rest for 3 minutes.
itemListElement.name: Cover and rest for 3 minutes.

itemListElement.text: Now transfer to a large bowl and start to knead the dough. Wet your hand to prevent it from burning.
itemListElement.name: Now transfer to a large bowl and start to knead the dough. Wet your hand to prevent it from burning.

itemListElement.text: Knead for 5 minutes or until the dough turns soft. Wet your hand and knead if the dough seems dry.
itemListElement.name: Knead for 5 minutes or until the dough turns soft. Wet your hand and knead if the dough seems dry.

recipeInstructions.name: How to shape Modak using hand:

itemListElement.text: Now take a ball-sized rice flour dough and roll.
itemListElement.name: Now take a ball-sized rice flour dough and roll.

itemListElement.text: With the help of both thumbs start pressing the edges and create a dent in the center.
itemListElement.name: With the help of both thumbs start pressing the edges and create a dent in the center.

itemListElement.text: Slowly press from the edges till it forms a cup.
itemListElement.name: Slowly press from the edges till it forms a cup.

itemListElement.text: Start creating pleats with your index finger and thumb.
itemListElement.name: Start creating pleats with your index finger and thumb.

itemListElement.text: Now scoop a tbsp of prepared coconut-jaggery stuffing.
itemListElement.name: Now scoop a tbsp of prepared coconut-jaggery stuffing.

itemListElement.text: Get the pleats together to form a bundle.
itemListElement.name: Get the pleats together to form a bundle.

itemListElement.text: Close the top by pinching and making it pointed.
itemListElement.name: Close the top by pinching and making it pointed.

recipeInstructions.name: How to shape Modak using mould:

itemListElement.text: Grease the modak mould with ghee to prevent it from sticking.
itemListElement.name: Grease the modak mould with ghee to prevent it from sticking.

itemListElement.text: Stuff the rice flour dough into the mould walls.
itemListElement.name: Stuff the rice flour dough into the mould walls.

itemListElement.text: Also, place a small ball-sized mixture in the centre.
itemListElement.name: Also, place a small ball-sized mixture in the centre.

itemListElement.text: Close tightly and scrape off the excess mixture.
itemListElement.name: Close tightly and scrape off the excess mixture.

itemListElement.text: Unmould the modak gently without breaking.
itemListElement.name: Unmould the modak gently without breaking.

itemListElement.text: Place the modak in steamer leaving gaps in between.
itemListElement.name: Place the modak in steamer leaving gaps in between.

itemListElement.text: cover and steam the modak for 10 minutes or till the shiny texture appears on them.
itemListElement.name: cover and steam the modak for 10 minutes or till the shiny texture appears on them.

itemListElement.text: Finally, of Ukadiche Modak to lord Ganesha and celebrate Ganesh Chathurthi.
itemListElement.name: Finally, of Ukadiche Modak to lord Ganesha and celebrate Ganesh Chathurthi.

recipeInstructions.text: ಮೊದಲಿಗೆ, ½ ಕಪ್ ಹುರುಳಿಯನ್ನು ತೊಳೆದು ಮತ್ತು 4 ಕಪ್ ನೀರಿನಿಂದ 2 ಗಂಟೆಗಳ ಕಾಲ ನೆನೆಸಿಡಿ.
recipeInstructions.name: ಮೊದಲಿಗೆ, ½ ಕಪ್ ಹುರುಳಿಯನ್ನು ತೊಳೆದು ಮತ್ತು 4 ಕಪ್ ನೀರಿನಿಂದ 2 ಗಂಟೆಗಳ ಕಾಲ ನೆನೆಸಿಡಿ.

recipeInstructions.text: 6 ಸೀಟಿಗಳಿಗೆ ಅದೇ ನೀರಿನಲ್ಲಿ ಪ್ರೆಷರ್ ಕುಕ್ ಮಾಡಿ. ನೀವು ನೆನೆಸುವ ಸಮಯ ಬಿಡಬೇಕಾದರೆ, 1 ಸೀಟಿಗೆ ಬೇಯಿಸಿ 20 ನಿಮಿಷಗಳ ಕಾಲ ಸಿಮ್ಮರ್ ನಲ್ಲಿಡಿ.

ಕೊಲ್ಲು ರಸಂ ಪಾಕವಿಧಾನ:

itemListElement.text: ಮೊದಲಿಗೆ, ಮಸಾಲಾ ಪೇಸ್ಟ್ ತಯಾರಿಸಲು, 3 ಬೆಳ್ಳುಳ್ಳಿ, 1 ಟೀಸ್ಪೂನ್ ಜೀರಿಗೆ, ½ ಟೀಸ್ಪೂನ್ ಪೆಪ್ಪರ್ ಮತ್ತು 2 ಟೀಸ್ಪೂನ್ ಬೇಯಿಸಿದ ಹುರುಳಿಯನ್ನು ರುಬ್ಬಿಕೊಳ್ಳಿ.
itemListElement.name: ಮೊದಲಿಗೆ, ಮಸಾಲಾ ಪೇಸ್ಟ್ ತಯಾರಿಸಲು, 3 ಬೆಳ್ಳುಳ್ಳಿ, 1 ಟೀಸ್ಪೂನ್ ಜೀರಿಗೆ, ½ ಟೀಸ್ಪೂನ್ ಪೆಪ್ಪರ್ ಮತ್ತು 2 ಟೀಸ್ಪೂನ್ ಬೇಯಿಸಿದ ಹುರುಳಿಯನ್ನು ರುಬ್ಬಿಕೊಳ್ಳಿ.

itemListElement.text: ಒರಟಾದ ಪೇಸ್ಟ್ಗೆ ರುಬ್ಬಿಕೊಳ್ಳಿ ಮತ್ತು ಪಕ್ಕಕ್ಕೆ ಇರಿಸಿ.
itemListElement.name: ಒರಟಾದ ಪೇಸ್ಟ್ಗೆ ರುಬ್ಬಿಕೊಳ್ಳಿ ಮತ್ತು ಪಕ್ಕಕ್ಕೆ ಇರಿಸಿ.

itemListElement.text: ಒಂದು ದೊಡ್ಡ ಕಡೈ ನಲ್ಲಿ, 3 ಟೀಸ್ಪೂನ್ ಎಣ್ಣೆ ಬಿಸಿ ಮಾಡಿ, 1 ಟೀಸ್ಪೂನ್ ಸಾಸಿವೆ, ¼ ಟೀಸ್ಪೂನ್ ಮೇಥಿ, ½ ಟೀಸ್ಪೂನ್ ಜೀರಾ ಮತ್ತು ಕೆಲವು ಕರಿ ಬೇವಿನ ಎಲೆಗಳನ್ನು ಸೇರಿಸಿ.
itemListElement.name: ಒಂದು ದೊಡ್ಡ ಕಡೈ ನಲ್ಲಿ, 3 ಟೀಸ್ಪೂನ್ ಎಣ್ಣೆ ಬಿಸಿ ಮಾಡಿ, 1 ಟೀಸ್ಪೂನ್ ಸಾಸಿವೆ, ¼ ಟೀಸ್ಪೂನ್ ಮೇಥಿ, ½ ಟೀಸ್ಪೂನ್ ಜೀರಾ ಮತ್ತು ಕೆಲವು ಕರಿ ಬೇವಿನ ಎಲೆಗಳನ್ನು ಸೇರಿಸಿ.

itemListElement.text: ಈಗ 1 ಟೊಮೆಟೊ, 1 ಕಪ್ ಹುಣಿಸೇಹಣ್ಣು ಸಾರ, ¼ ಟೀಸ್ಪೂನ್ ಅರಿಶಿನ, ½ ಟೀಸ್ಪೂನ್ ಬೆಲ್ಲ ಮತ್ತು 1 ಟೀಸ್ಪೂನ್ ಉಪ್ಪು ಸೇರಿಸಿ.

itemListElement.text: ಮಧ್ಯಮ ಜ್ವಾಲೆಯ ಮೇಲೆ 10 ನಿಮಿಷಗಳ ಕಾಲಮುಚ್ಚಿ ಕುದಿಸಿ.

itemListElement.text: ಈಗ ಕೊಲ್ಲು ಸಾರ (ಬೇಯಿಸಿದ ನೀರು) ಸೇರಿಸಿ ಚೆನ್ನಾಗಿ ಮಿಶ್ರಣ ಮಾಡಿ.
itemListElement.name: ಈಗ ಕೊಲ್ಲು ಸಾರ (ಬೇಯಿಸಿದ ನೀರು) ಸೇರಿಸಿ ಚೆನ್ನಾಗಿ ಮಿಶ್ರಣ ಮಾಡಿ.

itemListElement.text: 2 ನಿಮಿಷಗಳ ಕಾಲ ಕುದಿಸಿ ಸುವಾಸನೆಯನ್ನು ಹೀರಿಕೊಳ್ಳಲ್ಪಟ್ಟಿದೆ ಎಂದು ಖಚಿತಪಡಿಸಿಕೊಳ್ಳಿ.

itemListElement.text: ಅಂತಿಮವಾಗಿ, ಕೊತ್ತಂಬರಿ ಸೊಪ್ಪನ್ನು ಸೇರಿಸಿ ಮತ್ತು ಕೊಲ್ಲು ರಸಂ ಅನ್ನು ಬಿಸಿ ಅನ್ನದ ಜೊತೆ ಆನಂದಿಸಿ.

@graph.name: narali bhat recipe | narali bhaat | maharashtrian sweet coconut rice recipe
@graph.description: easy narali bhat recipe | narali bhaat | maharashtrian sweet coconut rice recipe

recipeInstructions.text: firstly, in a large kadai heat 2 tbsp ghee and saute 3 pods cardamom, 3 cloves, 1 inch cinnamon until it turns aromatic.
recipeInstructions.name: firstly, in a large kadai heat 2 tbsp ghee and saute 3 pods cardamom, 3 cloves, 1 inch cinnamon until it turns aromatic.

recipeInstructions.text: now add ½ cup basmati rice (soaked for 20 minutes) and saute for a minute.
recipeInstructions.name: now add ½ cup basmati rice (soaked for 20 minutes) and saute for a minute.

recipeInstructions.text: add 1 cup water, few saffron and ¼ tsp salt.
recipeInstructions.name: add 1 cup water, few saffron and ¼ tsp salt.

recipeInstructions.text: mix well, cover and simmer for 10 minutes or until rice is cooked well.
recipeInstructions.name: mix well, cover and simmer for 10 minutes or until rice is cooked well.

recipeInstructions.text: in another pan heat 1 tbsp ghee and roast 10 cashew and 2 tbsp raisins until it turns golden brown.
recipeInstructions.name: in another pan heat 1 tbsp ghee and roast 10 cashew and 2 tbsp raisins until it turns golden brown.

recipeInstructions.text: further add ½ cup jaggery and ½ cup coconut.
recipeInstructions.name: further add ½ cup jaggery and ½ cup coconut.

recipeInstructions.text: saute on low flame until jaggery melts and combined well.
recipeInstructions.name: saute on low flame until jaggery melts and combined well.

recipeInstructions.text: make sure the coconut jaggery mixture have turned aromatic.
recipeInstructions.name: make sure the coconut jaggery mixture have turned aromatic.

recipeInstructions.text: further transfer the coconut jaggery mixture into cooked rice and mix gently.
recipeInstructions.name: further transfer the coconut jaggery mixture into cooked rice and mix gently.

recipeInstructions.text: cover and simmer for 5 minutes or until flavours are absorbed well.
recipeInstructions.name: cover and simmer for 5 minutes or until flavours are absorbed well.

recipeInstructions.text: finally, add ¼ tsp cardamom powder and enjoy narali bhat.
recipeInstructions.name: finally, add ¼ tsp cardamom powder and enjoy narali bhat.

item.name: narali bhat recipe | narali bhaat | maharashtrian sweet coconut rice recipe

@graph.name: falafel recipe | easy falafel balls | how to make chickpea falafel
@graph.description: easy falafel recipe | easy falafel balls | how to make chickpea falafel

recipeInstructions.text: Firstly, soak 1½ cup chickpeas overnight and drain off the water.
recipeInstructions.name: Firstly, soak 1½ cup chickpeas overnight and drain off the water.

recipeInstructions.text: Transfer the soaked chickpeas into a mixer jar.
recipeInstructions.name: Transfer the soaked chickpeas into a mixer jar.

recipeInstructions.text: Add ½ onion, 3 cloves garlic, 4 chilli and 1 bunch coriander.
recipeInstructions.name: Add ½ onion, 3 cloves garlic, 4 chilli and 1 bunch coriander.

recipeInstructions.text: Pulse and grind to a coarse texture. You can also use a food chopper to blend.
recipeInstructions.name: Pulse and grind to a coarse texture. You can also use a food chopper to blend.

recipeInstructions.text: Transfer the mixture to the large bowl.
recipeInstructions.name: Transfer the mixture to the large bowl.

recipeInstructions.text: Add ½ tsp chilli powder, ½ tsp pepper powder, ½ tsp coriander powder, ½ tsp cumin powder, ½ tsp baking soda, 2 tbsp sesame and 1 tsp salt.
recipeInstructions.name: Add ½ tsp chilli powder, ½ tsp pepper powder, ½ tsp coriander powder, ½ tsp cumin powder, ½ tsp baking soda, 2 tbsp sesame and 1 tsp salt.

recipeInstructions.text: Squeeze and mix well making sure all the spices are well combined.
recipeInstructions.name: Squeeze and mix well making sure all the spices are well combined.

recipeInstructions.text: Take a ball-sized mixture and shape using a cookie cutter. You can shape to your choice.
recipeInstructions.name: Take a ball-sized mixture and shape using a cookie cutter. You can shape to your choice.

recipeInstructions.text: Deep fry in hot oil, keeping the flame on medium.
recipeInstructions.name: Deep fry in hot oil, keeping the flame on medium.

recipeInstructions.text: Do not touch the falafel until it starts to float by itself.
recipeInstructions.name: Do not touch the falafel until it starts to float by itself.

recipeInstructions.text: Stir occasionally, and fry uniformly until the falafel turns golden and crunchy.
recipeInstructions.name: Stir occasionally, and fry uniformly until the falafel turns golden and crunchy.

recipeInstructions.text: Drain off removing excess oil.
recipeInstructions.name: Drain off removing excess oil.

recipeInstructions.text: Finally, enjoy Crispy Falafel Recipe with hummus.
recipeInstructions.name: Finally, enjoy Crispy Falafel Recipe with hummus.

@graph.name: kuska recipe | kuska biryani recipe | how to make plain biryani recipe
@graph.description: easy kuska recipe | kuska biryani recipe | how to make plain biryani recipe
recipeIngredient: ½ tsp kashmiri red chilli powder

recipeInstructions.text: firstly, in a pressure cooker heat 2 tbsp ghee and saute spices.
recipeInstructions.name: firstly, in a pressure cooker heat 2 tbsp ghee and saute spices.

recipeInstructions.text: also saute 1 onion followed by 1 tsp ginger garlic paste and 1 green chilli.
recipeInstructions.name: also saute 1 onion followed by 1 tsp ginger garlic paste and 1 green chilli.

recipeInstructions.text: additionally add 1 tomato and saute till the tomatoes turn soft and mushy.
recipeInstructions.name: additionally add 1 tomato and saute till the tomatoes turn soft and mushy.

recipeInstructions.text: further keeping the flame on low, add ¼ cup whisked curd and saute till the curd combines well without curdling.
recipeInstructions.name: further keeping the flame on low, add ¼ cup whisked curd and saute till the curd combines well without curdling.

recipeInstructions.text: now add ¼ tsp turmeric, ½ tsp chilli powder, 1 tsp biryani masala and 1 tsp salt. saute on low flame till it turns aromatic.
recipeInstructions.name: now add ¼ tsp turmeric, ½ tsp chilli powder, 1 tsp biryani masala and 1 tsp salt. saute on low flame till it turns aromatic.

recipeInstructions.text: additionally, add 2 tbsp mint and 2 tbsp coriander. mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: additionally, add 2 tbsp mint and 2 tbsp coriander. mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: furthermore, add 1 cup basmati rice and 2 cup water. mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: furthermore, add 1 cup basmati rice and 2 cup water. mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: cover and pressure cook for 2 whistles on medium flame or till rice gets cooked completely.
recipeInstructions.name: cover and pressure cook for 2 whistles on medium flame or till rice gets cooked completely.

recipeInstructions.text: finally, serve kuska rice / kuska biryani with mirchi ka salan or raita.
recipeInstructions.name: finally, serve kuska rice / kuska biryani with mirchi ka salan or raita.

@graph.name: kaju masala recipe | kaju curry recipe | cashew nut masala curry
@graph.description: easy kaju masala recipe | kaju curry recipe | cashew nut masala curry
recipeIngredient: 1 tsp kashmiri red chilli powder / lal mirch powder
1 tsp kasuri methi / dry fenugreek leaves (crushed)

recipeInstructions.text: firstly, heat a tsp of oil and add 1 tsp jeera, 1 inch cinnamon stick and 1 bay leaf. saute till they turn aromatic.
recipeInstructions.name: firstly, heat a tsp of oil and add 1 tsp jeera, 1 inch cinnamon stick and 1 bay leaf. saute till they turn aromatic.

recipeInstructions.text: further add ½ onion and saute well.
recipeInstructions.name: further add ½ onion and saute well.

recipeInstructions.text: add in prepared tomato onion paste and saute till the paste thickens.
recipeInstructions.name: add in prepared tomato onion paste and saute till the paste thickens.

recipeInstructions.text: keeping the flame on low, add ½ tsp turmeric, 1 tsp red chilli powder, ½ tsp coriander powder and ½ tsp salt.
recipeInstructions.name: keeping the flame on low, add ½ tsp turmeric, 1 tsp red chilli powder, ½ tsp coriander powder and ½ tsp salt.

recipeInstructions.text: saute on low flame for a minute.
recipeInstructions.name: saute on low flame for a minute.

recipeInstructions.text: now add 1 cup water and ¼ cup cream.
recipeInstructions.name: now add 1 cup water and ¼ cup cream.

recipeInstructions.text: stir continuously till the cream completely combines well.
recipeInstructions.name: stir continuously till the cream completely combines well.

recipeInstructions.text: further add roasted cashews and stir well.
recipeInstructions.name: further add roasted cashews and stir well.

recipeInstructions.text: cover and simmer for 5 minutes or till the gravy thickens slightly.
recipeInstructions.name: cover and simmer for 5 minutes or till the gravy thickens slightly.

recipeInstructions.text: add in ½ tsp garam masala, 1 tsp kasuri methi and 1 tbsp coriander leaves.
recipeInstructions.name: add in ½ tsp garam masala, 1 tsp kasuri methi and 1 tbsp coriander leaves.

recipeInstructions.text: finally, serve kaju masala or cashew curry with roti or chapat
recipeInstructions.name: finally, serve kaju masala or cashew curry with roti or chapat

recipeInstructions.text: ಮೊದಲಿಗೆ, ಒಣಗಿದ ಕೆಂಪು ಮೆಣಸಿನಕಾಯಿಯನ್ನು ಬಿಸಿ ನೀರಿನಲ್ಲಿ 30 ನಿಮಿಷಗಳ ಕಾಲ ಅಥವಾ ಅವು ಮೃದುವಾಗುವವರೆಗೆ ನೆನೆಸಿಡಿ.
recipeInstructions.name: ಮೊದಲಿಗೆ, ಒಣಗಿದ ಕೆಂಪು ಮೆಣಸಿನಕಾಯಿಯನ್ನು ಬಿಸಿ ನೀರಿನಲ್ಲಿ 30 ನಿಮಿಷಗಳ ಕಾಲ ಅಥವಾ ಅವು ಮೃದುವಾಗುವವರೆಗೆ ನೆನೆಸಿಡಿ.

recipeInstructions.text: ನೀರನ್ನು ತ್ಯಜಿಸಿ ಅಥವಾ ಅಗತ್ಯವಿದ್ದರೆ ನೀರನ್ನು ಸೇರಿಸಿ ನಯವಾದ ಪೇಸ್ಟ್ ಗೆ ಬ್ಲೆಂಡ್ ಮಾಡಿ. ಪಕ್ಕಕ್ಕೆ ಇರಿಸಿ.
recipeInstructions.name: ನೀರನ್ನು ತ್ಯಜಿಸಿ ಅಥವಾ ಅಗತ್ಯವಿದ್ದರೆ ನೀರನ್ನು ಸೇರಿಸಿ ನಯವಾದ ಪೇಸ್ಟ್ ಗೆ ಬ್ಲೆಂಡ್ ಮಾಡಿ. ಪಕ್ಕಕ್ಕೆ ಇರಿಸಿ.

recipeInstructions.text: ಈಗ ದೊಡ್ಡ ಕಡಾಯಿಯಲ್ಲಿ, ¼ ಕಪ್ ಎಣ್ಣೆಯನ್ನು ಬಿಸಿ ಮಾಡಿ.
recipeInstructions.name: ಈಗ ದೊಡ್ಡ ಕಡಾಯಿಯಲ್ಲಿ, ¼ ಕಪ್ ಎಣ್ಣೆಯನ್ನು ಬಿಸಿ ಮಾಡಿ.

recipeInstructions.text: ¼ ಕಪ್ ಬೆಳ್ಳುಳ್ಳಿ ಮತ್ತು 2 ಟೇಬಲ್ಸ್ಪೂನ್ ಶುಂಠಿಯನ್ನು ಒಂದು ನಿಮಿಷಕ್ಕೆ ಹುರಿಯಿರಿ.

recipeInstructions.text: ಇದಲ್ಲದೆ, ತಯಾರಾದ ಕೆಂಪು ಮೆಣಸಿನಕಾಯಿ ಪೇಸ್ಟ್ ಅನ್ನು ಸೇರಿಸಿ.

recipeInstructions.text: 2 ನಿಮಿಷಗಳ ಕಾಲ ಹುರಿಯಿರಿ, ಇದರಿಂದ ಮೆಣಸಿನಕಾಯಿ ಚೆನ್ನಾಗಿ ಬೇಯುತ್ತದೆ.

@graph.name: Ginger Candy Recipe | Homemade Crystallised Ginger Chews
@graph.description: Easy Ginger Candy Recipe | Homemade Crystallised Ginger Chews

recipeInstructions.text: firstly, peel the skin of ginger and roughly chop.
recipeInstructions.name: firstly, peel the skin of ginger and roughly chop.

recipeInstructions.text: transfer the ginger to a blender and grind to smooth paste adding water if required.
recipeInstructions.name: transfer the ginger to a blender and grind to smooth paste adding water if required.

recipeInstructions.text: take the ginger paste into the pan and cook for a minute.
recipeInstructions.name: take the ginger paste into the pan and cook for a minute.

recipeInstructions.text: add 400 grams of jaggery and stir well.
recipeInstructions.name: add 400 grams of jaggery and stir well.

recipeInstructions.text: stir until the jaggery melts completely.
recipeInstructions.name: stir until the jaggery melts completely.

recipeInstructions.text: continue to cook until the mixture thickens and start to separate the pan. you can also check the consistency, by dropping the syrup in water and make sure it turns to soft ball consistency.
recipeInstructions.name: continue to cook until the mixture thickens and start to separate the pan. you can also check the consistency, by dropping the syrup in water and make sure it turns to soft ball consistency.

recipeInstructions.text: further add ½ tsp black salt, ½ tsp turmeric, ½ tsp pepper powder and ½ tsp ghee.
recipeInstructions.name: further add ½ tsp black salt, ½ tsp turmeric, ½ tsp pepper powder and ½ tsp ghee.

recipeInstructions.text: mix well making sure everything is well combined.
recipeInstructions.name: mix well making sure everything is well combined.

recipeInstructions.text: now immediately, drop a tsp of mixture over butter paper.
recipeInstructions.name: now immediately, drop a tsp of mixture over butter paper.

recipeInstructions.text: once cooled, coat with sugar powder to avoid from sticking.
recipeInstructions.name: once cooled, coat with sugar powder to avoid from sticking.

recipeInstructions.text: finally, store the ginger candy in an airtight container and use it for up to 3 months.

recipeInstructions.text: ನಿಮ್ಮ ಆಯ್ಕೆಯ 1 ಕಪ್ ಮೊಝರೆಲ್ಲಾ ಚೀಸ್ ಅಥವಾ ನಿಮ್ಮ ಆಯ್ಕೆಯ ಚೀಸ್ ಸೇರಿಸಿ. ಚೀಸ್ ಉಪ್ಪನ್ನು ಹೊಂದಿರುವುದರಿಂದ, ನಾನು ಇಲ್ಲಿ ಯಾವುದೇ ಹೆಚ್ಚುವರಿ ಉಪ್ಪನ್ನು ಸೇರಿಸಿಲ್ಲ.

recipeInstructions.name: ಎಲ್ಲವನ್ನೂ ಚೆನ್ನಾಗಿ ಸಂಯೋಜಿಸಲಾಗಿದೆಯಾ ಎಂದು ಖಚಿತಪಡಿಸಿಕೊಂಡು ಚೆನ್ನಾಗಿ ಮಿಶ್ರಣ ಮಾಡಿ.

recipeInstructions.text: ಸ್ಲರ್ರಿ ತಯಾರಿಸಲು, ದೊಡ್ಡ ಬಟ್ಟಲಿನಲ್ಲಿ ¾ ಕಪ್ ಕಾರ್ನ್‌ಫ್ಲೋರ್ ಮತ್ತು ½ ಕಪ್ ಮೈದಾ ತೆಗೆದುಕೊಳ್ಳಿ.
recipeInstructions.name: ಸ್ಲರ್ರಿ ತಯಾರಿಸಲು, ದೊಡ್ಡ ಬಟ್ಟಲಿನಲ್ಲಿ ¾ ಕಪ್ ಕಾರ್ನ್‌ಫ್ಲೋರ್ ಮತ್ತು ½ ಕಪ್ ಮೈದಾ ತೆಗೆದುಕೊಳ್ಳಿ.

recipeInstructions.text: ಸಹ, ½ ಟೀಸ್ಪೂನ್ ಕರಿ ಮೆಣಸು ಪುಡಿ, ½ ಮಿಕ್ಸೆಡ್ ಹರ್ಬ್ಸ್ ಮತ್ತು ¼ ಟೀಸ್ಪೂನ್ ಉಪ್ಪು ಸೇರಿಸಿ.
recipeInstructions.name: ಸಹ, ½ ಟೀಸ್ಪೂನ್ ಕರಿ ಮೆಣಸು ಪುಡಿ, ½ ಮಿಕ್ಸೆಡ್ ಹರ್ಬ್ಸ್ ಮತ್ತು ¼ ಟೀಸ್ಪೂನ್ ಉಪ್ಪು ಸೇರಿಸಿ.

recipeInstructions.text: ಈಗ ¾ ಕಪ್ ನೀರನ್ನು ಸೇರಿಸಿ ಮತ್ತು ಚೆನ್ನಾಗಿ ಮಿಶ್ರಣ ಮಾಡಿ ಮೃದುವಾದ ಉಂಡೆ ರಹಿತ ಬ್ಯಾಟರ್ ಅನ್ನು ರೂಪಿಸಿ. ಪಕ್ಕಕ್ಕೆ ಇರಿಸಿ.
recipeInstructions.name: ಈಗ ¾ ಕಪ್ ನೀರನ್ನು ಸೇರಿಸಿ ಮತ್ತು ಚೆನ್ನಾಗಿ ಮಿಶ್ರಣ ಮಾಡಿ ಮೃದುವಾದ ಉಂಡೆ ರಹಿತ ಬ್ಯಾಟರ್ ಅನ್ನು ರೂಪಿಸಿ. ಪಕ್ಕಕ್ಕೆ ಇರಿಸಿ.

recipeInstructions.text: ಈಗ, ಬ್ರೆಡ್ ಸ್ಲೈಸ್ ತೆಗೆದುಕೊಂಡು ಬದಿಗಳನ್ನು ಟ್ರಿಮ್ ಮಾಡಿ. ಬ್ರೆಡ್ ಅನ್ನು ತ್ರಿಕೋನವನ್ನಾಗಿ ಕತ್ತರಿಸಿ.
recipeInstructions.name: ಈಗ, ಬ್ರೆಡ್ ಸ್ಲೈಸ್ ತೆಗೆದುಕೊಂಡು ಬದಿಗಳನ್ನು ಟ್ರಿಮ್ ಮಾಡಿ. ಬ್ರೆಡ್ ಅನ್ನು ತ್ರಿಕೋನವನ್ನಾಗಿ ಕತ್ತರಿಸಿ.

recipeInstructions.text: ಈಗ ಅರ್ಧ ಸ್ಲೈಸ್ ಗೆ, 1 ಟೀಸ್ಪೂನ್ ಹಸಿರು ಚಟ್ನಿ ಮತ್ತು ಇನ್ನೊಂದು ಅರ್ಧ ಭಾಗಕ್ಕೆ ಟೊಮೆಟೊ ಸಾಸ್ ಅನ್ನು ಹರಡಿ.
recipeInstructions.name: ಈಗ ಅರ್ಧ ಸ್ಲೈಸ್ ಗೆ, 1 ಟೀಸ್ಪೂನ್ ಹಸಿರು ಚಟ್ನಿ ಮತ್ತು ಇನ್ನೊಂದು ಅರ್ಧ ಭಾಗಕ್ಕೆ ಟೊಮೆಟೊ ಸಾಸ್ ಅನ್ನು ಹರಡಿ.

recipeInstructions.text: ತಯಾರಾದ ಚೀಸ್ ಸ್ಟಫಿಂಗ್ ನ ಒಂದು ಸ್ಪೂನ್ ಇರಿಸಿ.
recipeInstructions.name: ತಯಾರಾದ ಚೀಸ್ ಸ್ಟಫಿಂಗ್ ನ ಒಂದು ಸ್ಪೂನ್ ಇರಿಸಿ.

recipeInstructions.text: ಮತ್ತೊಂದು ಸ್ಲೈಸ್ನೊಂದಿಗೆ ಕವರ್ ಮಾಡಿ. ಅದು ಚೆನ್ನಾಗಿ ಸುರಕ್ಷಿತವಾಗಿದೆ ಎಂದು ಖಚಿತಪಡಿಸಿಕೊಳ್ಳಲು ಬದಿಗಳನ್ನು ಒತ್ತಿ ಮತ್ತು ಮುಚ್ಚಿ.
recipeInstructions.name: ಮತ್ತೊಂದು ಸ್ಲೈಸ್ನೊಂದಿಗೆ ಕವರ್ ಮಾಡಿ. ಅದು ಚೆನ್ನಾಗಿ ಸುರಕ್ಷಿತವಾಗಿದೆ ಎಂದು ಖಚಿತಪಡಿಸಿಕೊಳ್ಳಲು ಬದಿಗಳನ್ನು ಒತ್ತಿ ಮತ್ತು ಮುಚ್ಚಿ.

recipeInstructions.text: ಈಗ ಕಾರ್ನ್‌ಫ್ಲೋರ್ ಸ್ಲರಿಯಲ್ಲಿ ಅದ್ದಿ, ಏಕರೂಪವಾಗಿ ಕೋಟ್ ಮಾಡಲು ಖಚಿತಪಡಿಸಿಕೊಳ್ಳಿ.
recipeInstructions.name: ಈಗ ಕಾರ್ನ್‌ಫ್ಲೋರ್ ಸ್ಲರಿಯಲ್ಲಿ ಅದ್ದಿ, ಏಕರೂಪವಾಗಿ ಕೋಟ್ ಮಾಡಲು ಖಚಿತಪಡಿಸಿಕೊಳ್ಳಿ.

recipeInstructions.text: ಗರಿಗರಿಯಾದ ಹೊರಗಿನ ಲೇಪನವನ್ನು ಪಡೆಯಲು ಬ್ರೆಡ್ ಕ್ರಂಬ್ಸ್ ನೊಂದಿಗೆ ರೋಲ್ ಮಾಡಿಕೊಳ್ಳಿ.
recipeInstructions.name: ಗರಿಗರಿಯಾದ ಹೊರಗಿನ ಲೇಪನವನ್ನು ಪಡೆಯಲು ಬ್ರೆಡ್ ಕ್ರಂಬ್ಸ್ ನೊಂದಿಗೆ ರೋಲ್ ಮಾಡಿಕೊಳ್ಳಿ.

recipeInstructions.text: ಬಿಸಿ ಎಣ್ಣೆಯಲ್ಲಿ ಡೀಪ್ ಫ್ರೈ ಮಾಡಿ, ಜ್ವಾಲೆಯನ್ನು ಮಧ್ಯಮವಾಗಿ ಇರಿಸಿ.
recipeInstructions.name: ಬಿಸಿ ಎಣ್ಣೆಯಲ್ಲಿ ಡೀಪ್ ಫ್ರೈ ಮಾಡಿ, ಜ್ವಾಲೆಯನ್ನು ಮಧ್ಯಮವಾಗಿ ಇರಿಸಿ.

recipeInstructions.text: ಬೈಟ್ಸ್ ಚಿನ್ನದ ಕಂದು ಬಣ್ಣ ಮತ್ತು ಗರಿಗರಿಯಾಗುವವರೆಗೆ ಎರಡೂ ಕಡೆ ಫ್ರೈ ಮಾಡಿ.
recipeInstructions.name: ಬೈಟ್ಸ್ ಚಿನ್ನದ ಕಂದು ಬಣ್ಣ ಮತ್ತು ಗರಿಗರಿಯಾಗುವವರೆಗೆ ಎರಡೂ ಕಡೆ ಫ್ರೈ ಮಾಡಿ.

recipeInstructions.text: ಅಂತಿಮವಾಗಿ, ಟೊಮೆಟೊ ಸಾಸ್‌ನೊಂದಿಗೆ ಬಡಿಸಿದಾಗ ಬ್ರೆಡ್ ಚೀಸ್ ಬೈಟ್ಸ್ ಪಾಕವಿಧಾನ ಉತ್ತಮ ರುಚಿ ನೀಡುತ್ತದೆ.
recipeInstructions.name: ಅಂತಿಮವಾಗಿ, ಟೊಮೆಟೊ ಸಾಸ್‌ನೊಂದಿಗೆ ಬಡಿಸಿದಾಗ ಬ್ರೆಡ್ ಚೀಸ್ ಬೈಟ್ಸ್ ಪಾಕವಿಧಾನ ಉತ್ತಮ ರುಚಿ ನೀಡುತ್ತದೆ.

@graph.name: pathiri recipe | ari pathiri | malbar rice pathiri | kerala pathiri
@graph.description: easy pathiri recipe | ari pathiri | malbar rice pathiri | kerala pathiri

recipeInstructions.text: firstly, in a tawa dry roast 1 cup rice flour on low to medium flame for 5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: firstly, in a tawa dry roast 1 cup rice flour on low to medium flame for 5 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: in a large kadai take 1¼ cup water, 1 tsp coconut oil and ½ tsp salt.
recipeInstructions.name: in a large kadai take 1¼ cup water, 1 tsp coconut oil and ½ tsp salt.

recipeInstructions.text: get the water a vigorous boil.
recipeInstructions.name: get the water a vigorous boil.

recipeInstructions.text: further, simmer the flame, and add roasted rice flour.
recipeInstructions.name: further, simmer the flame, and add roasted rice flour.

recipeInstructions.text: mix continuously until the dough is formed.
recipeInstructions.name: mix continuously until the dough is formed.

recipeInstructions.text: now turn off the flame, cover and rest for 5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: now turn off the flame, cover and rest for 5 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: furthermore, with oil greased hands, knead and combine together.
recipeInstructions.name: furthermore, with oil greased hands, knead and combine together.

recipeInstructions.text: pinch a ball sized dough. remaining dough cover and keep aside, do not allow to dry.
recipeInstructions.name: pinch a ball sized dough. remaining dough cover and keep aside, do not allow to dry.

recipeInstructions.text: dust rice flour slightly and start to roll.
recipeInstructions.name: dust rice flour slightly and start to roll.

recipeInstructions.text: roll as thin as possible dusting rice flour as required.
recipeInstructions.name: roll as thin as possible dusting rice flour as required.

recipeInstructions.text: cut the pathiri to round shape to seal any broken edges.
recipeInstructions.name: cut the pathiri to round shape to seal any broken edges.

recipeInstructions.text: now heat non stick tawa to medium heat and place rolled pathiri / rice roti.
recipeInstructions.name: now heat non stick tawa to medium heat and place rolled pathiri / rice roti.

recipeInstructions.text: cook for 30 seconds on low to medium flame on both sides without browning it.
recipeInstructions.name: cook for 30 seconds on low to medium flame on both sides without browning it.

recipeInstructions.text: press gently puffing up the pathiri. do not roast more as the roti turn hard.
recipeInstructions.name: press gently puffing up the pathiri. do not roast more as the roti turn hard.

recipeInstructions.text: finally, serve ari pathiri dipped in coconut milk or with curry or chutney.
recipeInstructions.name: finally, serve ari pathiri dipped in coconut milk or with curry or chutney.

recipeInstructions.text: firstly, in a pan heat 1 tsp ghee and roast ½ cup semiya.

recipeInstructions.text: roast until the semiya turns golden brown. keep aside.

recipeInstructions.text: in a large kadai heat 1 litre milk until it comes to a boil.

recipeInstructions.text: once the milk comes to a boil, add roasted semiya and mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: once the milk comes to a boil, add roasted semiya and mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: simmer for 5 minutes, or until the semiya is cooked well.

recipeInstructions.text: now in a small bowl take 3 tbsp custard powder and ½ cup milk.
recipeInstructions.name: now in a small bowl take 3 tbsp custard powder and ½ cup milk.

recipeInstructions.text: mix well making sure there are no lumps.
recipeInstructions.name: mix well making sure there are no lumps.

recipeInstructions.text: add in prepared custard milk and cook until the kheer thickens.
recipeInstructions.name: add in prepared custard milk and cook until the kheer thickens.

recipeInstructions.text: further, add ½ cup condensed milk and mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: cool the kheer completely.
recipeInstructions.name: cool the kheer completely.

recipeInstructions.text: now grind 1 cup mango into a smooth puree.
recipeInstructions.name: now grind 1 cup mango into a smooth puree.

recipeInstructions.text: add in prepared mango puree into the semiya kheer and mix well.

recipeIngredient: 1 tsp kasuri methi / dry fenugreek leaves

recipeInstructions.text: firstly, in a pressure cooker heat 4 tsp oil and saute ½ inch cinnamon, 2 pods cardamom, 1 tsp kasuri methi, ½ tsp cumin till it turns aromatic.
recipeInstructions.name: firstly, in a pressure cooker heat 4 tsp oil and saute ½ inch cinnamon, 2 pods cardamom, 1 tsp kasuri methi, ½ tsp cumin till it turns aromatic.

recipeInstructions.text: now add in ½ tsp turmeric, 1 tsp kashmiri red chilli powder and ½ tsp coriander powder. saute on low flame for 30 seconds.
recipeInstructions.name: now add in ½ tsp turmeric, 1 tsp kashmiri red chilli powder and ½ tsp coriander powder. saute on low flame for 30 seconds.

recipeInstructions.text: further add 1 onion and saute well.
recipeInstructions.name: further add 1 onion and saute well.

recipeInstructions.text: additionally add 1 tsp ginger garlic paste and saute well.
recipeInstructions.name: additionally add 1 tsp ginger garlic paste and saute well.

recipeInstructions.text: now add 2 tomato and saute till the tomatoes turn soft and mushy.
recipeInstructions.name: now add 2 tomato and saute till the tomatoes turn soft and mushy.

recipeInstructions.text: furthermore, add 2 potato cubed and 1 tsp salt.
recipeInstructions.name: furthermore, add 2 potato cubed and 1 tsp salt.

recipeInstructions.text: saute for a minute or more.
recipeInstructions.name: saute for a minute or more.

recipeInstructions.text: further add ½ cup peas, 1 cup water and 1 green chilli.
recipeInstructions.name: further add ½ cup peas, 1 cup water and 1 green chilli.

recipeInstructions.text: mix well and pressure cook for 3 whistles or till potato gets cooked well.
recipeInstructions.name: mix well and pressure cook for 3 whistles or till potato gets cooked well.

recipeInstructions.text: once the pressure gets settled down, mash slightly adjusting consistency.
recipeInstructions.name: once the pressure gets settled down, mash slightly adjusting consistency.

recipeInstructions.text: add in ½ tsp garam masala and 2 tbsp coriander leaves. mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: add in ½ tsp garam masala and 2 tbsp coriander leaves. mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: finally, serve aloo matar recipe with roti, kulcha or naan.
recipeInstructions.name: finally, serve aloo matar recipe with roti, kulcha or naan.

recipeInstructions.name: how to make paneer stuffing:

itemListElement.text: firstly, in a large bowl take ½ cup warm milk, 1 tsp sugar and 1 tsp dry yeast.
itemListElement.name: firstly, in a large bowl take ½ cup warm milk, 1 tsp sugar and 1 tsp dry yeast.

itemListElement.text: mix well and allow the yeast to activate.
itemListElement.name: mix well and allow the yeast to activate.

itemListElement.text: once the yeast activates, add 2 cup maida, 2 clove garlic, ½ tsp mixed herbs, ½ tsp chilli flakes and ½ tsp salt.
itemListElement.name: once the yeast activates, add 2 cup maida, 2 clove garlic, ½ tsp mixed herbs, ½ tsp chilli flakes and ½ tsp salt.

itemListElement.text: mix well and start to knead the dough.
itemListElement.name: mix well and start to knead the dough.

itemListElement.text: add milk as required and knead to a smooth dough.
itemListElement.name: add milk as required and knead to a smooth dough.

itemListElement.text: now add 2 tsp oil and continue to knead the dough.
itemListElement.name: now add 2 tsp oil and continue to knead the dough.

itemListElement.text: tuck the dough, cover and rest for 2 hours or until the dough doubles in size.
itemListElement.name: tuck the dough, cover and rest for 2 hours or until the dough doubles in size.

recipeInstructions.name: how to make paneer stuffing:

itemListElement.text: firstly, in a large pan heat 2 tbsp oil and saute 2 clove garlic.
itemListElement.name: firstly, in a large pan heat 2 tbsp oil and saute 2 clove garlic.

itemListElement.text: add ½ onion and saute until the onion shrinks.
itemListElement.name: add ½ onion and saute until the onion shrinks.

itemListElement.text: now add 2 tbsp sweet corn, 2 tbsp capsicum and saute well.
itemListElement.name: now add 2 tbsp sweet corn, 2 tbsp capsicum and saute well.

itemListElement.text: also add 2 tbsp tomato sauce, 2 tbsp eggless mayonnaise, ½ tsp mixed herbs, ½ tsp chilli flakes, ½ tsp chilli powder and ½ tsp salt.
itemListElement.name: also add 2 tbsp tomato sauce, 2 tbsp eggless mayonnaise, ½ tsp mixed herbs, ½ tsp chilli flakes, ½ tsp chilli powder and ½ tsp salt.

itemListElement.text: mix well making sure everything is well combined.
itemListElement.name: mix well making sure everything is well combined.

itemListElement.text: further, add ½ cup paneer and mix well. stuffing is ready, keep it aside.
itemListElement.name: further, add ½ cup paneer and mix well. stuffing is ready, keep it aside.

recipeInstructions.name: how to shape paneer parcel:

itemListElement.text: after the dough has rested for 2 hours, punch the dough gently and knead slightly.
itemListElement.name: after the dough has rested for 2 hours, punch the dough gently and knead slightly.

itemListElement.text: pinch a ball sized dough and roll gently.
itemListElement.name: pinch a ball sized dough and roll gently.

itemListElement.text: fold the sides shaping into a triangle.
itemListElement.name: fold the sides shaping into a triangle.

itemListElement.text: place a tsp cheese, followed by 1 tbsp prepared paneer stuffing and cheese.
itemListElement.name: place a tsp cheese, followed by 1 tbsp prepared paneer stuffing and cheese.

itemListElement.text: seal the tips with water and bring them together.
itemListElement.name: seal the tips with water and bring them together.

itemListElement.text: brush the parcel with milk to get a golden colour.
itemListElement.name: brush the parcel with milk to get a golden colour.

itemListElement.text: you can bake in kadai for 20 minutes or bake in the oven for 15 minutes.
itemListElement.name: you can bake in kadai for 20 minutes or bake in the oven for 15 minutes.

itemListElement.text: now brush with butter to get the shiny crust.

recipeInstructions.text: Firstly, in a pan heat 2 tbsp oil. Take spices and saute on low flame.

recipeInstructions.text: Add 1 inch ginger, 4 cloves garlic and 2 onion. Saute until the onions turn golden brown.
recipeInstructions.name: Add 1 inch ginger, 4 cloves garlic and 2 onion. Saute until the onions turn golden brown.

recipeInstructions.text: Also add 2 tomato, 2 tbsp badam and cook till the tomatoes soften.
recipeInstructions.name: Also add 2 tomato, 2 tbsp badam and cook till the tomatoes soften.

recipeInstructions.text: Cool completely, and transfer to the mixer jar.

recipeInstructions.text: Add ¼ cup curd, and grind to smooth paste.
recipeInstructions.name: Add ¼ cup curd, and grind to smooth paste.

recipeInstructions.text: Now sieve the puree to get a silky smooth texture. Keep aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Now sieve the puree to get a silky smooth texture. Keep aside.

recipeInstructions.text: In a Kadai, take 2 tbsp butter and 2 tbsp oil. Add ½ tsp turmeric, 1 tsp chilli powder, 1 tsp coriander powder and ½ tsp cumin powder.

recipeInstructions.text: Saute on low flame till the spices turn aromatic.
recipeInstructions.name: Saute on low flame till the spices turn aromatic.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in prepared puree and cook well.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in prepared puree and cook well.

recipeInstructions.text: Also add ¼ cup cream, 1 tsp salt and cook till the oil separates.
recipeInstructions.name: Also add ¼ cup cream, 1 tsp salt and cook till the oil separates.

recipeInstructions.text: Now add 20 cubes paneer, few kesar, 1 tsp sugar and mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: Now add 20 cubes paneer, few kesar, 1 tsp sugar and mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: Simmer for 5 minutes, or until the flavours are well absorbed.

recipeInstructions.text: Add 2 tbsp kasuri methi, 2 tbsp coriander and mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: Add 2 tbsp kasuri methi, 2 tbsp coriander and mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: now carefully pour the dosa batter over hot tawa.
recipeInstructions.name: now carefully pour the dosa batter over hot tawa.

recipeInstructions.text: cover and cook for 1 minute on medium flame.
recipeInstructions.name: cover and cook for 1 minute on medium flame.

recipeInstructions.text: once the dosa is cooked completely, it is ready to serve. do not cook neer dose on both sides.
recipeInstructions.name: once the dosa is cooked completely, it is ready to serve. do not cook neer dose on both sides.

recipeInstructions.text: finally, fold the dosa and serve neer dose / neer dosa immediately with mint chutney or coconut chutney.
recipeInstructions.name: finally, fold the dosa and serve neer dose / neer dosa immediately with mint chutney or coconut chutney.

recipeIngredient: ½ ಟೀಸ್ಪೂನ್ ಕಾಶ್ಮೀರಿ ಕೆಂಪು ಮೆಣಸಿನ ಪುಡಿ

recipeInstructions.text: ಮೊದಲನೆಯದಾಗಿ, ಮಸಾಲಾ ಪೇಸ್ಟ್ ತಯಾರಿಸಲು, ಎಣ್ಣೆಯನ್ನು ಬಿಸಿ ಮಾಡಿ ಈರುಳ್ಳಿ ಹಾಕಿ.
recipeInstructions.name: ಮೊದಲನೆಯದಾಗಿ, ಮಸಾಲಾ ಪೇಸ್ಟ್ ತಯಾರಿಸಲು, ಎಣ್ಣೆಯನ್ನು ಬಿಸಿ ಮಾಡಿ ಈರುಳ್ಳಿ ಹಾಕಿ.

recipeInstructions.text: ಈಗ, 1 ಟೀಸ್ಪೂನ್ ಶುಂಠಿ ಬೆಳ್ಳುಳ್ಳಿ ಪೇಸ್ಟ್ ಸೇರಿಸಿ ಚೆನ್ನಾಗಿ ಹುರಿಯಿರಿ.
recipeInstructions.name: ಈಗ, 1 ಟೀಸ್ಪೂನ್ ಶುಂಠಿ ಬೆಳ್ಳುಳ್ಳಿ ಪೇಸ್ಟ್ ಸೇರಿಸಿ ಚೆನ್ನಾಗಿ ಹುರಿಯಿರಿ.

recipeInstructions.text: ಹೆಚ್ಚುವರಿಯಾಗಿ 1 ಟೊಮೆಟೊ ಸೇರಿಸಿ ಮತ್ತು ಮೃದು ಮತ್ತು ಮೆತ್ತಗಾಗುವವರೆಗೆ ಸಾಟ್ ಮಾಡಿ.
recipeInstructions.name: ಹೆಚ್ಚುವರಿಯಾಗಿ 1 ಟೊಮೆಟೊ ಸೇರಿಸಿ ಮತ್ತು ಮೃದು ಮತ್ತು ಮೆತ್ತಗಾಗುವವರೆಗೆ ಸಾಟ್ ಮಾಡಿ.

recipeInstructions.text: ಇದಲ್ಲದೆ ¼ ಟೀಸ್ಪೂನ್ ಅರಿಶಿನ, ½ ಟೀಸ್ಪೂನ್ ಮೆಣಸಿನ ಪುಡಿ, ½ ಟೀಸ್ಪೂನ್ ಕೊತ್ತಂಬರಿ ಪುಡಿ ಮತ್ತು ¼ ಟೀಸ್ಪೂನ್ ಜೀರಿಗೆ ಪುಡಿ ಸೇರಿಸಿ.
recipeInstructions.name: ಇದಲ್ಲದೆ ¼ ಟೀಸ್ಪೂನ್ ಅರಿಶಿನ, ½ ಟೀಸ್ಪೂನ್ ಮೆಣಸಿನ ಪುಡಿ, ½ ಟೀಸ್ಪೂನ್ ಕೊತ್ತಂಬರಿ ಪುಡಿ ಮತ್ತು ¼ ಟೀಸ್ಪೂನ್ ಜೀರಿಗೆ ಪುಡಿ ಸೇರಿಸಿ.

recipeInstructions.text: ಮಸಾಲೆಗಳು ಸಂಪೂರ್ಣವಾಗಿ ಬೇಯುವವರೆಗೆ ಕಡಿಮೆ ಉರಿಯಲ್ಲಿ ಬೇಯಿಸಿ.
recipeInstructions.name: ಮಸಾಲೆಗಳು ಸಂಪೂರ್ಣವಾಗಿ ಬೇಯುವವರೆಗೆ ಕಡಿಮೆ ಉರಿಯಲ್ಲಿ ಬೇಯಿಸಿ.

recipeInstructions.text: ತಂಪಾಗಿಸಿ ಬ್ಲೆಂಡರ್ಗೆ ವರ್ಗಾಯಿಸಿ.
recipeInstructions.name: ತಂಪಾಗಿಸಿ ಬ್ಲೆಂಡರ್ಗೆ ವರ್ಗಾಯಿಸಿ.

recipeInstructions.text: ಯಾವುದೇ ನೀರನ್ನು ಸೇರಿಸದೇ ನಯವಾದ ಪೇಸ್ಟ್ಗೆ ರುಬ್ಬಿಕೊಳ್ಳಿ. ನಂತರ ಪಕ್ಕಕ್ಕೆ ಇರಿಸಿ.
recipeInstructions.name: ಯಾವುದೇ ನೀರನ್ನು ಸೇರಿಸದೇ ನಯವಾದ ಪೇಸ್ಟ್ಗೆ ರುಬ್ಬಿಕೊಳ್ಳಿ. ನಂತರ ಪಕ್ಕಕ್ಕೆ ಇರಿಸಿ.

recipeInstructions.text: ಈಗ ಅದೇ ಕಡೈ ಯಲ್ಲಿ ಎಣ್ಣೆ ಸೇರಿಸಿ.
recipeInstructions.name: ಈಗ ಅದೇ ಕಡೈ ಯಲ್ಲಿ ಎಣ್ಣೆ ಸೇರಿಸಿ.

recipeInstructions.text: 1 ಒಣಗಿದ ಕೆಂಪು ಮೆಣಸಿನಕಾಯಿ, 1 ಇಂಚಿನ ಶುಂಠಿ ಜುಲಿಯೆನ್ ಮತ್ತು ½ ಟೀಸ್ಪೂನ್ ಜೀರಿಗೆ ಸೇರಿಸಿ. ಚೆನ್ನಾಗಿ ಸಾಟ್ ಮಾಡಿ.
recipeInstructions.name: 1 ಒಣಗಿದ ಕೆಂಪು ಮೆಣಸಿನಕಾಯಿ, 1 ಇಂಚಿನ ಶುಂಠಿ ಜುಲಿಯೆನ್ ಮತ್ತು ½ ಟೀಸ್ಪೂನ್ ಜೀರಿಗೆ ಸೇರಿಸಿ. ಚೆನ್ನಾಗಿ ಸಾಟ್ ಮಾಡಿ.

recipeInstructions.text: ಇದಲ್ಲದೆ, ½ ತೆಳುವಾಗಿ ಕತ್ತರಿಸಿದ ಈರುಳ್ಳಿ ಸೇರಿಸಿ ಮತ್ತು ಒಂದು ನಿಮಿಷ ಬೇಯಿಸಿ.
recipeInstructions.name: ಇದಲ್ಲದೆ, ½ ತೆಳುವಾಗಿ ಕತ್ತರಿಸಿದ ಈರುಳ್ಳಿ ಸೇರಿಸಿ ಮತ್ತು ಒಂದು ನಿಮಿಷ ಬೇಯಿಸಿ.

recipeInstructions.text: ಹೆಚ್ಚುವರಿಯಾಗಿ, ½ ಕ್ಯಾಪ್ಸಿಕಂ ಸೇರಿಸಿ ಮತ್ತು ಸಾಟ್ ಮಾಡುವುದನ್ನು ಮುಂದುವರಿಸಿ.
recipeInstructions.name: ಹೆಚ್ಚುವರಿಯಾಗಿ, ½ ಕ್ಯಾಪ್ಸಿಕಂ ಸೇರಿಸಿ ಮತ್ತು ಸಾಟ್ ಮಾಡುವುದನ್ನು ಮುಂದುವರಿಸಿ.

recipeInstructions.text: ನಂತರ, 1 ಟೇಬಲ್ಸ್ಪೂನ್ ಟೊಮೆಟೊ ಸಾಸ್ ಮತ್ತು ರುಚಿಗೆ ತಕ್ಕಷ್ಟು ಉಪ್ಪು ಸೇರಿಸಿ. ಚೆನ್ನಾಗಿ ಬೆರೆಸಿ.
recipeInstructions.name: ನಂತರ, 1 ಟೇಬಲ್ಸ್ಪೂನ್ ಟೊಮೆಟೊ ಸಾಸ್ ಮತ್ತು ರುಚಿಗೆ ತಕ್ಕಷ್ಟು ಉಪ್ಪು ಸೇರಿಸಿ. ಚೆನ್ನಾಗಿ ಬೆರೆಸಿ.

recipeInstructions.text: ಈಗ ಪನೀರ್ ತುಂಡುಗಳು ಮತ್ತು ½ ತೆಳುವಾಗಿ ಕತ್ತರಿಸಿದ ಟೊಮೆಟೊ ಸೇರಿಸಿ.
recipeInstructions.name: ಈಗ ಪನೀರ್ ತುಂಡುಗಳು ಮತ್ತು ½ ತೆಳುವಾಗಿ ಕತ್ತರಿಸಿದ ಟೊಮೆಟೊ ಸೇರಿಸಿ.

recipeInstructions.text: ಪನೀರ್ ಅನ್ನು ಮುರಿಯದೆ ನಿಧಾನಕ್ಕೆ ಮಿಶ್ರಣವನ್ನು ನೀಡಿ.
recipeInstructions.name: ಪನೀರ್ ಅನ್ನು ಮುರಿಯದೆ ನಿಧಾನಕ್ಕೆ ಮಿಶ್ರಣವನ್ನು ನೀಡಿ.

recipeInstructions.text: ಮುಚ್ಚಿ 2 ನಿಮಿಷಗಳ ಕಾಲ ಸಿಮ್ಮರ್ ನಲ್ಲಿಡಿ, ಇದರಿಂದ ಪನೀರ್ ಎಲ್ಲಾ ಫ್ಲೇವರ್ ಗಳನ್ನು ಹೀರಿಕೊಳ್ಳುತ್ತದೆ ಮತ್ತು ಚೆನ್ನಾಗಿ ಬೇಯಿಸಲಾಗುತ್ತದೆ.
recipeInstructions.name: ಮುಚ್ಚಿ 2 ನಿಮಿಷಗಳ ಕಾಲ ಸಿಮ್ಮರ್ ನಲ್ಲಿಡಿ, ಇದರಿಂದ ಪನೀರ್ ಎಲ್ಲಾ ಫ್ಲೇವರ್ ಗಳನ್ನು ಹೀರಿಕೊಳ್ಳುತ್ತದೆ ಮತ್ತು ಚೆನ್ನಾಗಿ ಬೇಯಿಸಲಾಗುತ್ತದೆ.

recipeInstructions.text: ಈಗ ¼ ಟೀಸ್ಪೂನ್ ಗರಂ ಮಸಾಲ ಪುಡಿ ಮತ್ತು 2 ಟೀಸ್ಪೂನ್ ನಿಂಬೆ ರಸವನ್ನು ಸೇರಿಸಿ. ನಿಧಾನವಾಗಿ ಮಿಶ್ರಣ ಮಾಡಿ.
recipeInstructions.name: ಈಗ ¼ ಟೀಸ್ಪೂನ್ ಗರಂ ಮಸಾಲ ಪುಡಿ ಮತ್ತು 2 ಟೀಸ್ಪೂನ್ ನಿಂಬೆ ರಸವನ್ನು ಸೇರಿಸಿ. ನಿಧಾನವಾಗಿ ಮಿಶ್ರಣ ಮಾಡಿ.

recipeInstructions.text: ಅಂತಿಮವಾಗಿ, ಪನ್ನೀರ್ ಜಲ್ಫ್ರೆಜಿಯನ್ನು ಅನ್ನ, ರೋಟಿ ಅಥವಾ ನಾನ್ ನೊಂದಿಗೆ ಬಡಿಸಿ.
recipeInstructions.name: ಅಂತಿಮವಾಗಿ, ಪನ್ನೀರ್ ಜಲ್ಫ್ರೆಜಿಯನ್ನು ಅನ್ನ, ರೋಟಿ ಅಥವಾ ನಾನ್ ನೊಂದಿಗೆ ಬಡಿಸಿ.

itemListElement.text: ಹಿಂಡಿದ ಮೆಥಿಯನ್ನು 2 ನಿಮಿಷಗಳ ಕಾಲ ಅಥವಾ ಗಾತ್ರದಲ್ಲಿ ಕುಗ್ಗುವವರೆಗೆ ಸಾಟ್ ಮಾಡಿ. ಇದು ಕಹಿಯನ್ನು ಸಂಪೂರ್ಣವಾಗಿ ತೆಗೆದುಹಾಕಲು ಮತ್ತು ಬೇಯಿಸಲು ಸಹಾಯ ಮಾಡುತ್ತದೆ.

recipeInstructions.name: sago pearls preparation:

itemListElement.text: firstly, in a large kadai take 4 cup water and add ½ cup sabudana.

itemListElement.text: stir and boil for 10 minutes stirring in between.
itemListElement.name: stir and boil for 10 minutes stirring in between.

itemListElement.text: continue to boil until the sabudana turns translucent.
itemListElement.name: continue to boil until the sabudana turns translucent.

itemListElement.text: drain off the sabudana once it is cooked completely.

itemListElement.text: firstly, in a large kadai take 3 cup milk.

itemListElement.name: finally, rose milk is ready. you can adjust the concentration of rooh afza to your choice.

recipeInstructions.name: sabudana falooda assembling:

itemListElement.text: take a tall glass, and add 1 tbsp rooh afza and 2 tbsp sabja.
itemListElement.name: take a tall glass, and add 1 tbsp rooh afza and 2 tbsp sabja.

itemListElement.text: now add 2 tbsp prepared sago pearls and 2 tbsp strawberry jelly.
itemListElement.name: now add 2 tbsp prepared sago pearls and 2 tbsp strawberry jelly.

itemListElement.text: further add 2 tbsp nuts and 2 tbsp tutti frutti.
itemListElement.name: further add 2 tbsp nuts and 2 tbsp tutti frutti.

itemListElement.text: pour in 1 cup chilled rose milk and stir gently.
itemListElement.name: pour in 1 cup chilled rose milk and stir gently.

itemListElement.text: further scoop in 1 scoop vanilla ice cream.

itemListElement.text: garnish with chopped nuts, tutti frutti and cherry.

recipeInstructions.text: firstly, in a large bowl take 1 bunch of finely chopped methi.

recipeInstructions.text: further, add 2 tsp oil and grease the dough well.

recipeInstructions.text: cover and rest for 10 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: cover and rest for 10 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: after 10 minutes, knead the dough again. pinch a ball-sized dough.
recipeInstructions.name: after 10 minutes, knead the dough again. pinch a ball-sized dough.

recipeInstructions.text: dust with wheat flour and roll uniformly.
recipeInstructions.name: dust with wheat flour and roll uniformly.

recipeInstructions.text: further, roll to a slightly thick thickness like paratha.

recipeInstructions.text: now on a hot tawa place the rolled paratha and cook for a minute.
recipeInstructions.name: now on a hot tawa place the rolled paratha and cook for a minute.

recipeInstructions.text: furthermore, when the base is partly cooked, flip the aloo methi paratha.

recipeInstructions.text: also, spread ½ tsp olive oil / ghee and cook both sides.
